title: Outbound RDP Connections Over Non-Standard Tools
description:
Detects Non-Standard tools initiating a connection over port 3389 indicating possible lateral movement.
An initial baseline is required before using this utility to exclude third party RDP tooling that you might use.
author: Markus Neis
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (DestinationPort=3389 AND Initiated='true') AND (NOT (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\mstsc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\mstsc.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\dns.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND SourcePort=53 AND Protocol='udp') OR (Image LIKE '%\\Avast Software\\Avast\\AvastSvc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Avast\\AvastSvc.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%\\RDCMan.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE '%\\FSAssessment.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\FSDiscovery.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\MobaRTE.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mRemote.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mRemoteNG.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Passwordstate.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RemoteDesktopManager.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RemoteDesktopManager64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RemoteDesktopManagerFree.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RSSensor.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RTS2App.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RTSApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\spiceworks-finder.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Terminals.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\ws\_TunnelService.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\thor.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\thor64.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\SplunkUniversalForwarder\\bin\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Ranger\\SentinelRanger.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\TSplus\\Java\\bin\\HTML5service.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\TSplus\\Java\\bin\\HTML5service.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image IS NULL OR Image='' OR Image='<unknown process>'))

title: Outbound Network Connection Initiated By Microsoft Dialer
description:
Detects outbound network connection initiated by Microsoft Dialer.
The Microsoft Dialer, also known as Phone Dialer, is a built-in utility application included in various versions of the Microsoft Windows operating system. Its primary function is to provide users with a graphical interface for managing phone calls via a modem or a phone line connected to the computer.
This is an outdated process in the current conext of it's usage and is a common target for info stealers for process injection, and is used to make C2 connections, common example is "Rhadamanthys"
author: CertainlyP
falsepositives: In Modern Windows systems, unable to see legitimate usage of this process, However, if an organization has legitimate purpose for this there can be false positives.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\dialer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND Initiated='true') AND (NOT (DestinationIp LIKE '127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.16.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.17.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.18.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.19.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.20.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.21.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.22.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.27.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.28.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.29.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.30.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '172.31.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE '169.254.%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp='::1/128' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'fe8%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'fe9%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'fea%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'feb%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'fc%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationIp LIKE 'fd%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Network Connection Initiated via Finger.EXE
description:
Detects network connections via finger.exe, which can be abused by threat actors to retrieve remote commands for execution on Windows devices.
In one ClickFix malware campaign, adversaries leveraged the finger protocol to fetch commands from a remote server.
Since the finger utility is not commonly used in modern Windows environments, its presence already raises suspicion.
Investigating such network connections can also help identify potential malicious infrastructure used by threat actors
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Initiated='true' AND Image LIKE '%\\finger.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Network Connection Initiated By Eqnedt32.EXE
description: Detects network connections from the Equation Editor process "eqnedt32.exe".
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\eqnedt32.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Network Connection Initiated By IMEWDBLD.EXE
description: Detects a network connection initiated by IMEWDBLD.EXE. This might indicate potential abuse of the utility as a LOLBIN in order to download arbitrary files or additional payloads.
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Initiated='true' AND Image LIKE '%\\IMEWDBLD.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Network Connection Initiated Via Notepad.EXE
description:
Detects a network connection that is initiated by the "notepad.exe" process.
This might be a sign of process injection from a beacon process or something similar.
Notepad rarely initiates a network communication except when printing documents for example.
author: EagleEye Team
falsepositives: Printing documents via notepad might cause communication with the printer via port 9100 or similar.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\notepad.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT DestinationPort=9100)

title: DNS HybridConnectionManager Service Bus
description: Detects Azure Hybrid Connection Manager services querying the Azure service bus service
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: Legitimate use of Azure Hybrid Connection Manager and the Azure Service Bus service
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%servicebus.windows.net%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%HybridConnectionManager%' ESCAPE '\'

title: DNS Query by Finger Utility
description:
Detects DNS queries made by the finger utility, which can be abused by threat actors to retrieve remote commands for execution on Windows devices.
In one ClickFix malware campaign, adversaries leveraged the finger protocol to fetch commands from a remote server.
Since the finger utility is not commonly used in modern Windows environments, its presence already raises suspicion.
Investigating such DNS queries can also help identify potential malicious infrastructure used by threat actors for command and control (C2) communication.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\finger.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: DNS Query Tor .Onion Address - Sysmon
description: Detects DNS queries to an ".onion" address related to Tor routing networks
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%.hiddenservice.net' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.ca' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.cab' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.casa' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.city' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.direct' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.dog' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.glass' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.gq' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.ink' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.it' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.link' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.lt' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.lu' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.nu' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.pet' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.plus' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.rip' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.to' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion.top' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.onion' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.s1.tor-gateways.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.s2.tor-gateways.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.s3.tor-gateways.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.s4.tor-gateways.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.s5.tor-gateways.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.t2w.pw' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.ae.org' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.blutmagie.de' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.com' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.fi' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.io' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.org' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.tor2web.xyz' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%.torlink.co' ESCAPE '\'

title: DNS Query for Anonfiles.com Domain - Sysmon
description: Detects DNS queries for "anonfiles.com", which is an anonymous file upload platform often used for malicious purposes
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%.anonfiles.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious DNS Query Indicating Kerberos Coercion via DNS Object SPN Spoofing
description:
Detects DNS queries containing patterns associated with Kerberos coercion attacks via DNS object spoofing.
The pattern "1UWhRCAAAAA..BAAAA" is a base64-encoded signature that corresponds to a marshaled CREDENTIAL_TARGET_INFORMATION structure.
Attackers can use this technique to coerce authentication from victim systems to attacker-controlled hosts.
It is one of the strong indicators of a Kerberos coercion attack, where adversaries manipulate DNS records
to spoof Service Principal Names (SPNs) and redirect authentication requests like CVE-2025-33073.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%UWhRCA%' ESCAPE '\' AND QueryName LIKE '%BAAAA%' ESCAPE '\'

title: CVE-2024-49113 Exploitation Attempt - LDAP Nightmare
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2024-49113 known as LDAP Nightmare, based on "Application Error" log where the faulting application is "lsass.exe" and the faulting module is "WLDAP32.dll".
author: Samuel Monsempes
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND (Provider_Name='Application Error' AND EventID=1000 AND (Data LIKE '%lsass.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND Data LIKE '%WLDAP32.dll%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Exploitation of CVE-2024-3094 - Suspicious SSH Child Process
description: Detects potentially suspicious child process of SSH process (sshd) with a specific execution user. This could be a sign of potential exploitation of CVE-2024-3094.
author: Arnim Rupp, Nasreddine Bencherchali, Thomas Patzke
falsepositives: Administrative activity directly with root authentication might trigger this rule if it's unnecessarily prefixed with "sh -c" or "bash -c"
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ParentImage LIKE '%/sshd' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE 'bash -c%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE 'sh -c%' ESCAPE '\') AND User='root'

title: Potential Raspberry Robin Aclui Dll SideLoading
description: Detects potential sideloading of malicious "aclui.dll" by OleView.This behavior was observed in Raspberry-Robin variants reported by chekpoint research on Feburary 2024.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\OleView.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\aclui.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SDKs\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR Signed='true')) AND (NOT Image LIKE '%\\Windows Resource Kit\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Kapeka Backdoor Scheduled Task Creation
description: Detects Kapeka backdoor scheduled task creation based on attributes such as paths, commands line flags, etc.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND (EventID=4698 AND (TaskContent LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskContent LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TaskContent LIKE '%rundll32%' ESCAPE '\' AND TaskContent LIKE '%.wll%' ESCAPE '\' AND TaskContent LIKE '%#1%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TaskContent LIKE '%OneDrive%' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskContent LIKE '%Sens Api%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Kapeka Decrypted Backdoor Indicator
description:
Detects the presence of a file that is decrypted backdoor binary dropped by the Kapeka Dropper, which disguises itself as a hidden file under a folder named "Microsoft" within "CSIDL_COMMON_APPDATA" or "CSIDL_LOCAL_APPDATA", depending on the process privileges.
The file, typically 5-6 characters long with a random combination of consonants and vowels followed by a ".wll" extension to pose as a legitimate file to evade detection.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename REGEXP '\\[a-zA-Z]{5,6}\.wll') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\win32log.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\crdss.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Kapeka Backdoor Loaded Via Rundll32.EXE
description:
Detects the Kapeka Backdoor binary being loaded by rundll32.exe.
The Kapeka loader drops a backdoor, which is a DLL with the '.wll' extension masquerading as a Microsoft Word Add-In.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded REGEXP '[a-zA-Z]{5,6}\.wll'

title: Potential CSharp Streamer RAT Loading .NET Executable Image
description: Detects potential CSharp Streamer RAT loading .NET executable image by using the default file name and path associated with the tool.
author: Luca Di Bartolomeo
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded REGEXP '\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\dat[0-9A-Z]{4}\.tmp'

title: File Creation Related To RAT Clients
description: File .conf created related to VenomRAT, AsyncRAT and Lummac samples observed in the wild.
author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
falsepositives: Legitimate software creating a file with the same name
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\mydata\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\datalogs\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\hvnc\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\dcrat\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\datalogs.conf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\hvnc.conf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\dcrat.conf' ESCAPE '\'))

title: ScreenConnect - SlashAndGrab Exploitation Indicators
description: Detects indicators of exploitation by threat actors during exploitation of the "SlashAndGrab" vulnerability related to ScreenConnect as reported Team Huntress
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\ScreenConnect\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\LB3.exe%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\mpyutd.msi%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\perflogs\\RunSchedulerTaskOnce.ps1%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\ProgramData\\1.msi%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\mpyutd.msi%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\ProgramData\\update.dat%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Users\\oldadmin\\Documents\\MilsoftConnect\\Files\\ta.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Help\\Help\\SentinelAgentCore.dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Help\\Help\\SentinelUI.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\spsrv.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\svchost.exe%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Forest Blizzard APT - File Creation Activity
description:
Detects the creation of specific files inside of ProgramData directory.
These files were seen being created by Forest Blizzard as described by MSFT.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Comms\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Intel\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Kaspersky Lab\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Bitdefender\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\ESET\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\NVIDIA\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\UbiSoft\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Steam\\v%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\prnms003.inf\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\prnms009.inf\_%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ((TargetFilename LIKE '%.save' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\doit.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\execute.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\servtask.bat' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\wayzgoose%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: DPRK Threat Actor - C2 Communication DNS Indicators
description: Detects DNS queries for C2 domains used by DPRK Threat actors.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName='connection.lockscreen.kro.kr' OR QueryName='updating.dothome.co.kr'

title: Malware Shellcode in Verclsid Target Process
description: Detects a process access to verclsid.exe that injects shellcode from a Microsoft Office application / VBA macro
author: John Lambert (tech), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetImage LIKE '%\\verclsid.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess='0x1FFFFF') AND ((CallTrace LIKE '%|UNKNOWN(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CallTrace LIKE '%VBE7.DLL%' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE '%\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CallTrace LIKE '%|UNKNOWN%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Adwind RAT / JRAT
description: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tom Ueltschi, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Oracle%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\java%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.exe %' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%cscript.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%Retrive%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.vbs %' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Fireball Archer Install
description: Detects Archer malware invocation via rundll32
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%rundll32.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%InstallArcherSvc%' ESCAPE '\')

title: StoneDrill Service Install
description: This method detects a service install of the malicious Microsoft Network Realtime Inspection Service service described in StoneDrill report by Kaspersky
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='System' AND (Provider_Name='Service Control Manager' AND EventID=7045 AND ServiceName='NtsSrv' AND ImagePath LIKE '% LocalService' ESCAPE '\')

title: Ps.exe Renamed SysInternals Tool
description: Detects renamed SysInternals tool execution with a binary named ps.exe as used by Dragonfly APT group and documented in TA17-293A report
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%ps.exe -accepteula%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-s cmd /c netstat%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Turla Service Install
description: This method detects a service install of malicious services mentioned in Carbon Paper - Turla report by ESET
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='System' AND (Provider_Name='Service Control Manager' AND EventID=7045 AND (ServiceName='srservice' OR ServiceName='ipvpn' OR ServiceName='hkmsvc'))

title: Equation Group C2 Communication
description: Detects communication to C2 servers mentioned in the operational notes of the ShadowBroker leak of EquationGroup C2 tools
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

title: Potential MuddyWater APT Activity
description: Detects potential Muddywater APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%vbscript:Close(Execute("CreateObject(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-w 1 -exec Bypass%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%Win32\_OperatingSystem%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%Win32\_NetworkAdapterConfiguration%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%root\\SecurityCenter2%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%[System.Net.DNS]%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%[Convert]::ToBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%[System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString]%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%GetResponse().GetResponseStream()%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%[System.Net.HttpWebRequest]::Create(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-bxor %' ESCAPE '\'))

title: TropicTrooper Campaign November 2018
description: Detects TropicTrooper activity, an actor who targeted high-profile organizations in the energy and food and beverage sectors in Asia
author: @41thexplorer, Microsoft Defender ATP
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine LIKE '%abCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCc%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Oracle WebLogic Exploit CVE-2020-14882
description: Detects exploitation attempts on WebLogic servers
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/console/images/\%252E\%252E\%252Fconsole.portal%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/console/css/\%2e%' ESCAPE '\'

title: CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation attempts
author: NVISO
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ecp/default.aspx%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\_\_VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\_\_VIEWSTATE=%' ESCAPE '\'

title: TerraMaster TOS CVE-2020-28188
description: Detects the exploitation of the TerraMaster TOS vulnerability described in CVE-2020-28188
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/include/makecvs.php%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_Event=%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.py%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.sh%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%chmod%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\_GET%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Cisco ASA FTD Exploit CVE-2020-3452
description: Detects exploitation attempts on Cisco ASA FTD systems exploiting CVE-2020-3452 with a status code of 200 (sccessful exploitation)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%+CSCOT+/translation-table%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%+CSCOT+/oem-customization%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&textdomain=/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&textdomain=\%%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&name=/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&name=\%%' ESCAPE '\') AND `sc-status`=200

title: Suspicious PrinterPorts Creation (CVE-2020-1048)
description: Detects new commands that add new printer port which point to suspicious file
author: EagleEye Team, Florian Roth
falsepositives: New printer port install on host
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%Add-PrinterPort -Name%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.bat%' ESCAPE '\')) OR CommandLine LIKE '%Generic / Text Only%' ESCAPE '\')

title: ComRAT Network Communication
description: Detects Turla ComRAT network communication.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `c-uri` LIKE '%/index/index.php?h=%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Blue Mockingbird - Registry
description: Attempts to detect system changes made by Blue Mockingbird
author: Trent Liffick (@tliffick)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\wercplsupport\\Parameters\\ServiceDll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Ke3chang/TidePool Malware Activity
description: Detects registry modifications potentially related to the Ke3chang/TidePool malware as seen in campaigns running in 2019 and 2020
author: Markus Neis, Swisscom
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%-Property DWORD -name DisableFirstRunCustomize -value 2 -Force%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-Property String -name Check\_Associations -value%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-Property DWORD -name IEHarden -value 0 -Force%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious VBScript UN2452 Pattern
description: Detects suspicious inline VBScript keywords as used by UNC2452
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%Execute%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%CreateObject%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%RegRead%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%window.close%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT CommandLine LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: TAIDOOR RAT DLL Load
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Chinese TAIDOOR RAT malware load
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%dll,MyStart%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dll MyStart%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '% MyStart' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%rundll32.exe%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: GALLIUM Artefacts - Builtin
description: Detects artefacts associated with activity group GALLIUM - Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center indicators released in December 2019.
author: Tim Burrell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Microsoft-Windows-DNS-Server/Analytical' AND (EventID=257 AND (QNAME='asyspy256.ddns.net' OR QNAME='hotkillmail9sddcc.ddns.net' OR QNAME='rosaf112.ddns.net' OR QNAME='cvdfhjh1231.myftp.biz' OR QNAME='sz2016rose.ddns.net' OR QNAME='dffwescwer4325.myftp.biz' OR QNAME='cvdfhjh1231.ddns.net'))

title: Potential CVE-2022-46169 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts that target the Cacti Command Injection CVE-2022-46169
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/remote\_agent.php%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%action=polldata%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%poller\_id=%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%| base64 -d | /bin/bash`%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%7C\%20base64\%20-d\%20\%7C\%20\%2Fbin\%2Fbash\%60%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%`whoami%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cmd%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential OWASSRF Exploitation Attempt - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation attempt of the OWASSRF variant targeting exchange servers It uses the OWA endpoint to access the powershell backend endpoint
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='POST' AND `sc-status`=200 AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/owa/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%@%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%40%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (`cs-user-agent`='ClientInfo' OR `cs-user-agent`='Microsoft WinRM Client' OR `cs-user-agent`='Exchange BackEnd Probes'))

title: Potential OWASSRF Exploitation Attempt - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation attempt of the OWASSRF variant targeting exchange servers It uses the OWA endpoint to access the powershell backend endpoint
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='POST' AND `sc-status`=200 AND (`c-uri` LIKE '%/owa/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `c-uri` LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`c-uri` LIKE '%@%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%\%40%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (`c-useragent`='ClientInfo' OR `c-useragent`='Microsoft WinRM Client' OR `c-useragent`='Exchange BackEnd Probes'))

title: Atlassian Bitbucket Command Injection Via Archive API
description: Detects attempts to exploit the Atlassian Bitbucket Command Injection CVE-2022-36804
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/rest/api/latest/projects/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%prefix=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%00--exec%' ESCAPE '\'

title: CVE-2022-31656 VMware Workspace ONE Access Auth Bypass
description:
Detects the exploitation of VMware Workspace ONE Access Authentication Bypass vulnerability as described in CVE-2022-31656
VMware Workspace ONE Access, Identity Manager and vRealize Automation contain an authentication bypass vulnerability affecting local domain users.
A malicious actor with network access to the UI may be able to obtain administrative access without the need to authenticate.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/SAAS/t/\_/;/%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Atlassian Confluence CVE-2022-26134
description: Detects spawning of suspicious child processes by Atlassian Confluence server which may indicate successful exploitation of CVE-2022-26134
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ParentImage LIKE '/opt/atlassian/confluence/%' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE '%/java' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%/bin/sh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%bash%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dash%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ksh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%zsh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%csh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%fish%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%python%' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache LPE
description: Detects files created during the local privilege exploitation of CVE-2022-24527 Microsoft Connected Cache
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%WindowsPowerShell\\Modules\\webAdministration\\webAdministration.psm1' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (User LIKE '%AUTHORI%' ESCAPE '\' OR User LIKE '%AUTORI%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2022-21587 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts of CVE-2022-21587 an arbitrary file upload vulnerability impacting Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS). CVE-2022-21587 can lead to unauthenticated remote code execution.
author: Isa Almannaei
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneViewerXMLService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneUploaderService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneDownloadService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/OA\_HTML/BneOfflineLOVService_bne:uueupload=TRUE%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Apache Spark Shell Command Injection - Weblogs
description: Detects attempts to exploit an apache spark server via CVE-2014-6287 from a weblogs perspective
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_doAs=`%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Apache Spark Shell Command Injection - ProcessCreation
description: Detects attempts to exploit an apache spark server via CVE-2014-6287 from a commandline perspective
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ParentImage LIKE '%\\bash' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%id -Gn `%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%id -Gn ''%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential KDC RC4-HMAC Downgrade Exploit - CVE-2022-37966
description: Detects the exploitation of a security bypass and elevation of privilege vulnerability with Authentication Negotiation by using weak RC4-HMAC negotiation
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='System' AND (EventID=42 AND (Provider_Name='Kerberos-Key-Distribution-Center' OR Provider_Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kerberos-Key-Distribution-Center') AND Level=2)

title: Potential Centos Web Panel Exploitation Attempt - CVE-2022-44877
description: Detects potential exploitation attempts that target the Centos Web Panel 7 Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution CVE-2022-44877
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/login/index.php%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%login=%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%login=$(%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%base64%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%subprocess%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%socket%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%${IFS}%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cHl0aG9u%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%B5dGhvb%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%weXRob2%' ESCAPE '\')

title: MSSQL Extended Stored Procedure Backdoor Maggie
description: This rule detects the execution of the extended storage procedure backdoor named Maggie in the context of Microsoft SQL server
author: Denis Szadkowski, DIRT / DCSO CyTec
falsepositives: Legitimate extended stored procedures named maggie
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND (Provider_Name='MSSQLSERVER' AND EventID=8128 AND Message LIKE '%maggie%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Raspberry Robin Dot Ending File
description: Detects commandline containing reference to files ending with a "." This scheme has been seen used by raspberry-robin
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine REGEXP '\\[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,32}\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,6}\.[ "']{1}'

title: BlueSky Ransomware Artefacts
description: Detect access to files and shares with names and extensions used by BlueSky ransomware which could indicate a current or previous encryption attempt.
author: j4son
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND (((EventID=4663 OR EventID=4656) AND (ObjectName LIKE '%.bluesky' ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE '%DECRYPT FILES BLUESKY%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (EventID=5145 AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE '%.bluesky' ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE '%DECRYPT FILES BLUESKY%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Bumblebee Remote Thread Creation
description: Detects remote thread injection events based on action seen used by bumblebee
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (SourceImage LIKE '%\\wabmig.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\wab.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\ImagingDevices.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetImage LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential ACTINIUM Persistence Activity
description: Detects specific process parameters as used by ACTINIUM scheduled task persistence creation.
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%schtasks%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%create%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%wscript%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% /e:vbscript%' ESCAPE '\')

title: MERCURY APT Activity
description: Detects suspicious command line patterns seen being used by MERCURY APT
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%-exec bypass -w 1 -enc%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%UwB0AGEAcgB0AC0ASgBvAGIAIAAtAFMAYwByAGkAcAB0AEIAbABvAGMAawAgAHsAKABzAGEAcABzACAAKAAiAHAA%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Rejetto HTTP File Server RCE
description: Detects attempts to exploit a Rejetto HTTP File Server (HFS) via CVE-2014-6287
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_search=\%00{.%' ESCAPE '\' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%save|%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cmd.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cmd /c%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cmd /r%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cmd /k%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%cscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%wscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%python%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%comspec\%%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Windows\\INetCache%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.cab' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.inf%' ESCAPE '\'))) AND (NOT (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%AppData\\Local\\Temp%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Content.inf' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-21978 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects the exploitation of the VMware View Planner vulnerability described in CVE-2021-21978
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%logupload%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%logMetaData%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%wsgi\_log\_upload.py%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Possible Exploitation of Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
description: Detects log entries that appear in exploitation attempts against MS Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @testanull
falsepositives: Unknown, please report false positives via https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/issues
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='MSExchange Management' AND ((EventID=6 OR EventID=8) AND (Data LIKE '%Cmdlet failed. Cmdlet Get-App, %' ESCAPE '\' OR Data LIKE '%Task Get-App throwing unhandled exception: System.InvalidCastException:%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-26858 Exchange Exploitation
description:
Detects possible successful exploitation for vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26858 by looking for
creation of non-standard files on disk by Exchange Server’s Unified Messaging service
which could indicate dropping web shells or other malicious content
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%UMWorkerProcess.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (TargetFilename LIKE '%CacheCleanup.bin' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.txt' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.LOG' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.cfg' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%cleanup.bin' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2021-44077 POC Default Dropped File
description: Detects the creation of "msiexec.exe" in the "bin" directory of the ManageEngine SupportCenter Plus (Related to CVE-2021-44077) and public POC available (See references section)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ManageEngine\\SupportCenterPlus\\bin\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: ADSelfService Exploitation
description: Detects suspicious access to URLs that was noticed in cases in which attackers exploitated the ADSelfService vulnerability CVE-2021-40539
author: Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems), Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/help/admin-guide/Reports/ReportGenerate.jsp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ServletApi/../RestApi/LogonCustomization%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ServletApi/../RestAPI/Connection%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Pulse Connect Secure RCE Attack CVE-2021-22893
description: This rule detects exploitation attempts using Pulse Connect Secure(PCS) vulnerability (CVE-2021-22893)
author: Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/dana-na/auth/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/dana-ws/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/dana-cached/%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_id=%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_token=%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%Secid\_canceltoken.cgi%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%CGI::param%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%meeting%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%smb%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%namedusers%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%metric%' ESCAPE '\')

title: SonicWall SSL/VPN Jarrewrite Exploitation
description: Detects exploitation attempts of the SonicWall Jarrewrite Exploit
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/cgi-bin/jarrewrite.sh%' ESCAPE '\' AND (`cs-user-agent` LIKE '%:;%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-user-agent` LIKE '%() {%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-user-agent` LIKE '%/bin/bash -c%' ESCAPE '\')

title: OMIGOD HTTP No Authentication RCE - CVE-2021-38647
description:
Detects the exploitation of OMIGOD (CVE-2021-38647) which allows remote execute (RCE) commands as root with just a single unauthenticated HTTP request.
Verify, successful, exploitation by viewing the HTTP client (request) body to see what was passed to the server (using PCAP).
Within the client body is where the code execution would occur. Additionally, check the endpoint logs to see if suspicious commands or activity occurred within the timeframe of this HTTP request.
author: Nate Guagenti (neu5ron)
falsepositives: Exploits that were attempted but unsuccessful.

Scanning attempts with the abnormal use of the HTTP POST method with no indication of code execution within the HTTP Client (Request) body. An example would be vulnerability scanners trying to identify unpatched versions while not actually exploiting the vulnerability. See description for investigation tips.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (status_code=200 AND uri='/wsman' AND method='POST') AND (NOT client_header_names LIKE '%AUTHORIZATION%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT request_body_len=0)

title: VMware vCenter Server File Upload CVE-2021-22005
description: Detects exploitation attempts using file upload vulnerability CVE-2021-22005 in the VMWare vCenter Server.
author: Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/analytics/telemetry/ph/api/hyper/send_%' ESCAPE '\'

title: CVE-2021-21972 VSphere Exploitation
description: Detects the exploitation of VSphere Remote Code Execution vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-21972
author: Bhabesh Raj
falsepositives: OVA uploads to your VSphere appliance
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-query`='/ui/vropspluginui/rest/services/uploadova'

title: Potential PrintNightmare Exploitation Attempt
description: Detect DLL deletions from Spooler Service driver folder. This might be a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2021-1675
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\spoolsv.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\3\\%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Sitecore Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237
description: Detects exploitation attempts of Sitecore Experience Platform Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237 found in Report.ashx
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/sitecore/shell/ClientBin/Reporting/Report.ashx%' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: Suspicious Computer Account Name Change CVE-2021-42287
description: Detects the renaming of an existing computer account to a account name that doesn't contain a $ symbol as seen in attacks against CVE-2021-42287
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND ((EventID=4781 AND OldTargetUserName LIKE '%$%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT NewTargetUserName LIKE '%$%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: LPE InstallerFileTakeOver PoC CVE-2021-41379
description: Detects PoC tool used to exploit LPE vulnerability CVE-2021-41379
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Other MSI packages for which your admins have used that name
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND (EventID=1033 AND Provider_Name='MsiInstaller' AND Data LIKE '%test pkg%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Exchange ProxyShell Pattern
description: Detects URL patterns that could be found in ProxyShell exploitation attempts against Exchange servers (failed and successful)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Rich Warren
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`sc-status`=401 AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/autodiscover.json%' ESCAPE '\' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/powershell%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/mapi/nspi%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/EWS%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%X-Rps-CAT%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (`sc-status`=401 AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%autodiscover.json_@%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%autodiscover.json\%3f@%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%3f@foo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%Email=autodiscover/autodiscover.json%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%json_@foo.com%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Exploitation of CVE-2021-26814 in Wazuh
description: Detects the exploitation of the Wazuh RCE vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26814
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/manager/files_path=etc/lists/../../../../..%' ESCAPE '\'

title: CVE-2021-41773 Exploitation Attempt
description:
Detects exploitation of flaw in path normalization in Apache HTTP server 2.4.49.
An attacker could use a path traversal attack to map URLs to files outside the expected document root.
If files outside of the document root are not protected by "require all denied" these requests can succeed.
Additionally this flaw could leak the source of interpreted files like CGI scripts.
This issue is known to be exploited in the wild. This issue only affects Apache 2.4.49 and not earlier versions.
author: daffainfo, Florian Roth
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%2e/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/icons/.\%2e/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%\%32\%65/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/icons/.\%\%32\%65/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/cgi-bin/.\%\%\%25\%33%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/icons/.\%\%\%25\%33%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`sc-status`=200 OR `sc-status`=301)

title: Conti NTDS Exfiltration Command
description: Detects a command used by conti to exfiltrate NTDS
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%7za.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\C$\\temp\\log.zip%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
description: Detects a command used by conti to find volume shadow backups
author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems), Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%vssadmin list shadows%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%log.txt%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential NetWire RAT Activity - Registry
description: Detects registry keys related to NetWire RAT
author: Christopher Peacock
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='New registry value created') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\software\\NetWire%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Devil Bait Potential C2 Communication Traffic
description: Detects potential C2 communication related to Devil Bait malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri` LIKE '%/cross.php_op=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri` LIKE '%&dt=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri` LIKE '%&uid=%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Devil Bait Related Indicator
description: Detects the creation of ".xml" and ".txt" files in folders of the "\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft" directory by uncommon processes. This behavior was seen common across different Devil Bait samples and stages as described by the NCSC
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.txt' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xml' ESCAPE '\')

title: Pingback Backdoor DLL Loading Activity
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\msdtc.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\oci.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Pingback Backdoor File Indicators
description: Detects the use of Pingback backdoor that creates ICMP tunnel for C2 as described in the trustwave report
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%updata.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\oci.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Goofy Guineapig Backdoor Activity
description: Detects a specific broken command that was used by Goofy-Guineapig as described by the NCSC report.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine LIKE '%choice /t \%d /d y /n >nul%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Goofy Guineapig Backdoor IOC
description: Detects malicious indicators seen used by the Goofy Guineapig malware
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\config.dat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\GoogleUpdate.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\GoogleUpdate\\tmp.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\GoogleUpdate\\goopdate.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Goofy Guineapig Backdoor Potential C2 Communication
description: Detects potential C2 communication related to Goofy Guineapig backdoor
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `c-useragent`='Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.71 Safari/537.36' AND `cs-host`='static.tcplog.com'

title: Small Sieve Malware File Indicator Creation
description: Detects filename indicators that contain a specific typo seen used by the Small Sieve malware.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Roaming\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND TargetFilename LIKE '%Microsift%' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\MicrosoftWindowsOutlookDataPlus.txt' ESCAPE '\'

title: Small Sieve Malware CommandLine Indicator
description: Detects specific command line argument being passed to a binary as seen being used by the malware Small Sieve.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine LIKE '%.exe Platypus' ESCAPE '\'

title: DEWMODE Webshell Access
description: Detects access to DEWMODE webshell as described in FIREEYE report
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_dwn=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&fn=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.html_%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%&dwn=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%_fn=%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.html_%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Exchange Exploitation Used by HAFNIUM
description: Detects exploitation attempts in Exchange server logs as described in blog posts reporting on HAFNIUM group activity
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate access to other web applications that use the same folder names as Exchange (e.g. owa, ecp) but are not Microsoft Exchange related
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/owa/auth/Current/themes/resources/%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/owa/auth/Current/%' ESCAPE '\' AND (`cs-user-agent`='DuckDuckBot/1.0;+(+http://duckduckgo.com/duckduckbot.html)' OR `cs-user-agent` LIKE 'facebookexternalhit/1.1+(+http://www.facebook.com/externalhit\_uatext.php)' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Baiduspider/2.0;++http://www.baidu.com/search/spider.html)' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Bingbot/2.0;++http://www.bing.com/bingbot.htm)' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Googlebot/2.1;++http://www.google.com/bot.html' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Konqueror/3.5;+Linux)+KHTML/3.5.5+(like+Gecko)+(Exabot-Thumbnails)' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Yahoo!+Slurp;+http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/ysearch/slurp)' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+YandexBot/3.0;++http://yandex.com/bots)' OR `cs-user-agent` LIKE 'Mozilla/5.0+(X11;+Linux+x86\_64)+AppleWebKit/537.36+(KHTML,+like+Gecko)+Chrome/51.0.2704.103+Safari/537.36' ESCAPE '\')) OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ecp/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-user-agent`='ExchangeServicesClient/0.0.0.0' OR `cs-user-agent`='python-requests/2.19.1' OR `cs-user-agent`='python-requests/2.25.1')) OR ((`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/aspnet\_client/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/owa/%' ESCAPE '\') AND `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-user-agent`='antSword/v2.1' OR `cs-user-agent`='Googlebot/2.1+(+http://www.googlebot.com/bot.html)' OR `cs-user-agent`='Mozilla/5.0+(compatible;+Baiduspider/2.0;++http://www.baidu.com/search/spider.html)')) OR ((`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/owa/auth/Current/%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ecp/default.flt%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ecp/main.css%' ESCAPE '\') AND `cs-method`='POST') OR (`cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/ecp/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.js%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: APT PRIVATELOG Image Load Pattern
description: Detects an image load pattern as seen when a tool named PRIVATELOG is used and rarely observed under legitimate circumstances
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\clfsw32.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Scanner PoC for CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE Vuln
description: Detects the use of a scanner by zerosum0x0 that discovers targets vulnerable to  CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE aka BlueKeep
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Adam Bradbury (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND (EventID=4625 AND TargetUserName='AAAAAAA')

title: Sudo Privilege Escalation CVE-2019-14287
description: Detects users trying to exploit sudo vulnerability reported in CVE-2019-14287
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE CommandLine LIKE '% -u#%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Chafer Malware URL Pattern
description: Detects HTTP request used by Chafer malware to receive data from its C2.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `c-uri` LIKE '%/asp.asp?ui=%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Baby Shark Malware Activity
description: Detects activity that could be related to Baby Shark malware
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%powershell.exe mshta.exe http%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.hta%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg query "HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\\Software\\Microsoft\\Terminal Server Client\\Default"%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%cmd.exe /c taskkill /im cmd.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).UploadFile(''http%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Formbook Process Creation
description: Detects Formbook like process executions that inject code into a set of files in the System32 folder, which executes a special command command line to delete the dropper from the AppData Temp folder. We avoid false positives by excluding all parent process with command line parameters.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), oscd.community, Jonhnathan Ribeiro
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (((ParentCommandLine LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%/c%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%del%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%/c%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%del%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Desktop\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%/C%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%type nul >%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Desktop\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND CommandLine LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Snatch Ransomware Activity
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Snatch ransomware word document droppers
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Scripts that shutdown the system immediately and reboot them in safe mode are unlikely
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine REGEXP 'shutdown\s+/r /f /t 00' OR CommandLine REGEXP 'net\s+stop SuperBackupMan')

title: Ursnif Malware Download URL Pattern
description: Detects download of Ursnif malware done by dropper documents.
author: Thomas Patzke
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`c-uri` LIKE '%/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `c-uri` LIKE '%.php?l=%' ESCAPE '\') AND `c-uri` LIKE '%.cab' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: Potential Ursnif Malware Activity - Registry
description: Detects registry keys related to Ursnif malware.
author: megan201296
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='New registry value created') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\AppDataLow\\Software\\Microsoft\\3A861D62-51E0-7C9D-AB0E-15700F2219A4' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Emotet Activity
description: Detects all Emotet like process executions that are not covered by the more generic rules
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% -e% PAA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%JABlAG4AdgA6AHUAcwBlAHIAcAByAG8AZgBpAGwAZQ%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%QAZQBuAHYAOgB1AHMAZQByAHAAcgBvAGYAaQBsAGUA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%kAGUAbgB2ADoAdQBzAGUAcgBwAHIAbwBmAGkAbABlA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%IgAoACcAKgAnACkAOwAkA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%IAKAAnACoAJwApADsAJA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iACgAJwAqACcAKQA7ACQA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%JABGAGwAeAByAGgAYwBmAGQ%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%PQAkAGUAbgB2ADoAdABlAG0AcAArACgA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%0AJABlAG4AdgA6AHQAZQBtAHAAKwAoA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%9ACQAZQBuAHYAOgB0AGUAbQBwACsAKA%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (CommandLine LIKE '%fAAgAEMAbwBuAHYAZQByAHQAVABvAC0ASgBzAG8AbgAgAC0ARQByAHIAbwByAEEAYwB0AGkAbwBuACAAUwBpAGwAZQBuAHQAbAB5AEMAbwBuAHQAaQBuAHUAZQ%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%wAIABDAG8AbgB2AGUAcgB0AFQAbwAtAEoAcwBvAG4AIAAtAEUAcgByAG8AcgBBAGMAdABpAG8AbgAgAFMAaQBsAGUAbgB0AGwAeQBDAG8AbgB0AGkAbgB1AGUA%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%8ACAAQwBvAG4AdgBlAHIAdABUAG8ALQBKAHMAbwBuACAALQBFAHIAcgBvAHIAQQBjAHQAaQBvAG4AIABTAGkAbABlAG4AdABsAHkAQwBvAG4AdABpAG4AdQBlA%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential EmpireMonkey Activity
description: Detects potential EmpireMonkey APT activity
author: Markus Neis, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%/e:jscript%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Local\\Temp\\Errors.bat%' ESCAPE '\')

title: APT40 Dropbox Tool User Agent
description: Detects suspicious user agent string of APT40 Dropbox tool
author: Thomas Patzke
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `c-useragent`='Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/36.0.1985.143 Safari/537.36' AND `cs-host`='api.dropbox.com'

title: Operation Wocao Activity
description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), frack113
falsepositives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%checkadmin.exe 127.0.0.1 -all%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=powershell dir=in%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%cmd /c powershell.exe -ep bypass -file c:\\s.ps1%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/tn win32times /f%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%create win32times binPath=%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%\\c$\\windows\\system32\\devmgr.dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% -exec bypass -enc JgAg%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%type %keepass\\KeePass.config.xml%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iie.exe iie.txt%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%reg query HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\\Software\\%\\PuTTY\\Sessions\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Operation Wocao Activity - Security
description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), frack113
falsepositives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND (EventID=4799 AND TargetUserName LIKE 'Administr%' ESCAPE '\' AND CallerProcessName LIKE '%\\checkadmin.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Commvault QOperation Path Traversal Webshell Drop (CVE-2025-57790)
description:
Detects the use of qoperation.exe with the -file argument to write a JSP file to the webroot, indicating a webshell drop.
This is a post-authentication step corresponding to CVE-2025-57790.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%qoperation%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%exec%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% -af %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.xml %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Apache\\webapps\\ROOT\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.jsp%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential SAP NetViewer Webshell Command Execution
description:
Detects potential command execution via webshell in SAP NetViewer through JSP files with cmd parameter.
This rule is created to detect exploitation of vulnerabilities like CVE-2025-31324, which allows remote code execution via a webshell.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate applications using cmd parameter for non-malicious purposes
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/irj/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%.jsp%' ESCAPE '\') AND ((`cs-uri-query` LIKE 'cmd=%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE 'command=%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE 'exec\_cmd=%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE 'exec=%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/dev/tcp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/etc/passwd%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%2fdev\%2ftcp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%2fetc\%2fpasswd%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%=uname%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%=whoami%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%ifconfig%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%ping%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%pwd%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%echo%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%base64%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Java WebShell Upload in SAP NetViewer Server
description:
Detects potential Java webshell uploads via HTTP requests with Content-Type 'application/octet-stream' and Java file extensions.
This behavior might indicate exploitation of vulnerabilities like CVE-2025-31324, which allows remote code execution through webshells in SAP NetViewer.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate uploads of Java files in development environments
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-content-type`='application/octet-stream' AND `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/irj/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%.jsp%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%.class' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%.java' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%.jsp' ESCAPE '\')

title: Commvault QLogin Argument Injection Authentication Bypass (CVE-2025-57791)
description:
Detects the use of argument injection in the Commvault qlogin command - potential exploitation for CVE-2025-57791.
An attacker can inject the `-localadmin` parameter via the password field to bypass authentication and gain a privileged token.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%qlogin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% -cs %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% -localadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '% -clp %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\_localadmin\_\_%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Exploitation of RCE Vulnerability CVE-2025-33053 - Image Load
description:
Detects potential exploitation of remote code execution vulnerability CVE-2025-33053
by monitoring suspicious image loads from WebDAV paths. The exploit involves malicious executables from
attacker-controlled WebDAV servers loading the Windows system DLLs like gdi32.dll, netapi32.dll, etc.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '\\\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\DavWWWRoot\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE '%\\route.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\netsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\makecab.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\dxdiag.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\ipconfig.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Exploitation of RCE Vulnerability CVE-2025-33053 - Process Access
description:
Detects potential exploitation of remote code execution vulnerability CVE-2025-33053
by looking for process access that involves legitimate Windows executables (iediagcmd.exe, CustomShellHost.exe)
accessing suspicious executables hosted on WebDAV shares. This indicates an attacker may be exploiting
Process.Start() search order manipulation to execute malicious code from attacker-controlled WebDAV servers
instead of legitimate system binaries. The vulnerability allows unauthorized code execution through
external control of file names or paths via WebDAV.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\internet explorer\\iediagcmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\CustomShellHost.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetImage LIKE '\\\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\DavWWWRoot\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetImage LIKE '%\\route.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\netsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\makecab.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\dxdiag.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\ipconfig.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Exploitation Activity of CVE-2025-59287 - WSUS Deserialization
description: Detects cast exceptions in Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) application logs that highly indicate exploitation attempts of CVE-2025-59287, a deserialization vulnerability in WSUS.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate WSUS operations that may trigger similar error messages
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND (Provider_Name='Windows Server Update Services' AND EventID=7053 AND (Data LIKE '%System.InvalidCastException%' ESCAPE '\' AND Data LIKE '%System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider%' ESCAPE '\' AND Data LIKE '%Unable to cast object of type%' ESCAPE '\' AND Data LIKE '%System.Windows.Media.Brush%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Exploitation of CVE-2025-4427/4428 Ivanti EPMM Pre-Auth RCE
description:
Detects potential exploitation of a chained vulnerability attack targeting Ivanti EPMM 12.5.0.0.
CVE-2025-4427 allows unauthenticated access to protected API endpoints via an authentication bypass,
which can then be leveraged to trigger CVE-2025-4428 — a remote code execution vulnerability through
template injection. This sequence enables unauthenticated remote code execution, significantly increasing
the impact of exploitation.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/mifs/rs/api/v2/featureusage%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%format=%' ESCAPE '\') AND (((`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%java.lang.Runtime%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.getMethod%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%getRuntime%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.exec(%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%java\%2elang\%2eRuntime%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%2egetMethod%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%2eexec\%28%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%6a\%61\%76\%61\%2e\%6c\%61\%6e\%67\%2e\%52\%75\%6e\%74\%69\%6d\%65\%65\%28\%29%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%67\%65\%74\%52\%75\%6e\%74\%69\%6d\%65%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%2e\%65\%78\%65\%63\%28%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%{7%7}%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%7B7%7\%7D%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%7b7\%2a7\%7d%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Linux Suspicious Child Process from Node.js - React2Shell
description:
Detects suspicious child processes spawned from Node.js server processes on Linux systems, potentially indicating remote code execution exploitation such as CVE-2025-55182 (React2Shell).
This rule particularly looks for exploitation of vulnerability on Node.js Servers where attackers abuse Node.js child_process module to execute arbitrary system commands.
When execSync() or exec() is used, the command line often includes a shell invocation followed by suspicious commands or scripts (e.g., /bin/sh -c <malicious-command>).
For other methods, the Image field will show the spawned process directly.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ParentImage LIKE '%/node' ESCAPE '\' AND (ParentCommandLine LIKE '%--experimental-https%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%--experimental-next-config-strip-types%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%/node\_modules/next%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%next dev%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%next start%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%node\_modules/.bin%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%react-scripts start%' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE '%start-server.js%' ESCAPE '\')) AND ((((Image LIKE '%/busybox' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/cat' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/curl' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/dash' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/dig' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/head' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/id' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/ifconfig' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/ip' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/java' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/less' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/lua' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/more' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/nc' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/ncat' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/netcat' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/netstat' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/nslookup' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/perl' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/ping' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/python' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/python2' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/ruby' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/socat' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/tail' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/whoami' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%/python%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%/dev/tcp/%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/dev/udp/%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/hosts%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/passwd%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/shadow%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%base64%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%cat %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dig%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ifconfig%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%IO::Socket::INET%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%java%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%less %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%lua%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%mkfifo %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%more%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%nc %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ncat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%netcat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%netstat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%nslookup%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%perl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%php%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ping%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ps -ef%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ps aux%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%python%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%rcat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ruby%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%sh -i 2>&1%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-c id%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%socat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%uname%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%whoami%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE '%/sh' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT Image LIKE '%-c' ESCAPE '\')) OR ((Image LIKE '%/sh' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%-c' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%/dev/tcp/%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/dev/udp/%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/hosts%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/passwd%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%/etc/shadow%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%base64%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%cat %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dig%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ifconfig%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%IO::Socket::INET%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%java%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%less %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%lua%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%mkfifo %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%more%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%nc %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ncat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%netcat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%netstat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%nslookup%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%perl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%php%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ping%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ps -ef%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ps aux%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%python%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%rcat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ruby%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%sh -i 2>&1%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-c id%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%socat%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%uname%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%wget%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%whoami%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Cisco ASA Exploitation Activity - Proxy
description: Detects suspicious requests to Cisco ASA WebVpn via proxy logs associated with CVE-2025-20333 and CVE-2025-20362 exploitation.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-stem`='/+CSCOU+/MacTunnelStart.jar' OR `cs-uri-stem`='/+CSCOL+/csvrloader64.cab' OR `cs-uri-stem`='/+CSCOL+/csvrloader.jar')

title: Non-Standard Nsswitch.Conf Creation - Potential CVE-2025-32463 Exploitation
description:
Detects the creation of nsswitch.conf files in non-standard directories, which may indicate exploitation of CVE-2025-32463.
This vulnerability requires an attacker to create a nsswitch.conf in a directory that will be used during sudo chroot operations.
When sudo executes, it loads malicious shared libraries from user-controlled locations within the chroot environment,
potentially leading to arbitrary code execution and privilege escalation.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawn Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/nsswitch.conf' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT TargetFilename='/etc/nsswitch.conf')

title: FunkLocker Ransomware File Creation
description: Detects the creation of files with the ".funksec" extension, which is appended to encrypted files by the FunkLocker ransomware.
author: Saiprashanth Pulisetti ( @Prashanthblogs)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%.funksec' ESCAPE '\'

title: Atomic MacOS Stealer - Persistence Indicators
description: Detects creation of persistence artifacts placed by Atomic MacOS Stealer in macOS systems. Recent Atomic MacOS Stealer variants have been observed dropping these to maintain persistent access after compromise.
author: Jason Phang Vern - Onn, Robbin Ooi Zhen Heng (Gen Digital)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%/curl' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '/Users/%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.helper' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename='/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.finder.helper.plist'

title: Atomic MacOS Stealer - FileGrabber Activity
description: Detects suspicious activity associated with Atomic MacOS Stealer (Amos) campaigns, including execution of FileGrabber and curl-based POST requests used for data exfiltration. The rule identifies either the execution of FileGrabber targeting /tmp or the use of curl to POST sensitive user data (including files such as /tmp/out.zip) to remote servers, which are key indicators of Amos infostealer activity.
author: Jason Phang Vern - Onn, Robbin Ooi Zhen Heng (Gen Digital)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (CommandLine LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%POST%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%user:%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-H %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%BuildID%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%file=@/tmp/out.zip%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%cl: 0%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%FileGrabber%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/tmp%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Katz Stealer DLL Loaded
description:
Detects loading of DLLs associated with Katz Stealer malware 2025 variants.
Katz Stealer is a malware variant that is known to be used for stealing sensitive information from compromised systems.
The process that loads these DLLs are very likely to be malicious.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\katz\_ontop.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\received\_dll.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: DNS Query To Katz Stealer Domains - Network
description:
Detects DNS queries to domains associated with Katz Stealer malware.
Katz Stealer is a malware variant that is known to be used for stealing sensitive information from compromised systems.
In Enterprise environments, DNS queries to these domains may indicate potential malicious activity or compromise.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE query LIKE '%katz-panel.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR query LIKE '%katz-stealer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR query LIKE '%katzstealer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR query LIKE '%twist2katz.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: DNS Query To Katz Stealer Domains
description:
Detects DNS queries to domains associated with Katz Stealer malware.
Katz Stealer is a malware variant that is known to be used for stealing sensitive information from compromised systems.
In Enterprise environments, DNS queries to these domains may indicate potential malicious activity or compromise.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%katz-panel.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%katz-stealer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%katzstealer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%twist2katz.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Katz Stealer Suspicious User-Agent
