description: Detects network connections with a suspicious user-agent string containing "katz-ontop", which may indicate Katz Stealer activity.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_agent LIKE '%katz-ontop%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Shai-Hulud Malicious GitHub Workflow Creation
description: Detects creation of shai-hulud-workflow.yml file associated with Shai Hulud worm targeting NPM supply chain attack that exfiltrates GitHub secrets
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%.github/workflows/shai-hulud-workflow.yml' ESCAPE '\'

title: Shai-Hulud NPM Package Malicious Exfiltration via Curl
description: Detects potential Shai Hulud NPM package attack attempting to exfiltrate data via curl to external webhook sites.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%/curl' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%curl%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-d%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%webhook.site/bb8ca5f6-4175-45d2-b042-fc9ebb8170b7%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Grixba Malware Reconnaissance Activity
description:
Detects execution of the Grixba reconnaissance tool based on suspicious command-line parameter combinations.
This tool is used by the Play ransomware group for network enumeration, data gathering, and event log clearing.
author: yxinmiracle, Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate tools that use similar command-line argument structures (e.g., a tool with '--mode scan' and '--input file.txt') could trigger this rule. However, the specific combinations are indicative of reconnaissance or defense evasion.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%-m %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-mode %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-m:%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-mode:%' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%-i %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-input %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-i:%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-input:%' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%scan %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%scanall %' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%:f %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:r %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:s %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% f %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% r %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% s %' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-27363 Exploitation - HTA File Creation By FoxitPDFReader
description: Detects suspicious ".hta" file creation in the startup folder by Foxit Reader. This can be an indication of CVE-2023-27363 exploitation.
author: Gregory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\FoxitPDFReader.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.hta' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential CVE-2023-25157 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-25157 a SQL injection in GeoServer
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/geoserver/ows%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%CQL\_FILTER=%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%PropertyIsLike%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%strEndsWith%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%strStartsWith%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%FeatureId%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%jsonArrayContains%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%DWithin%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%+--%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%+AS+%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%+OR+%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%FROM%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%ORDER+BY%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%SELECT%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%sleep\%28%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%substring\%28%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%UNION%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%WHERE%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - Share Access
description: Detects access to a file share with a naming schema seen being used during exploitation of CVE-2023-36884
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND (EventID=5140 AND ((ShareName LIKE '%\\MSHTML\_C7\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ShareName REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}') OR (ShareLocalPath LIKE '%\\MSHTML\_C7\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ShareLocalPath REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}')))

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - URL Marker
description: Detects a unique URL marker seen being used by RomCom potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `c-uri` LIKE '%/MSHTML\_C7/%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential CVE-2303-36884 URL Request Pattern Traffic
description: Detects a specific URL pattern containing a specific extension and parameters pointing to an IP address. This pattern was seen being used by RomCOM potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `c-uri` REGEXP '\.(zip|asp|htm|url|xml|chm|mht|vbs|search-ms)\?d=[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}'

title: Exploitation Attempt Of CVE-2023-46214 Using Public POC Code
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-46214, a remote code execution (RCE) in Splunk Enterprise through insecure XML parsing using known public proof of concept code
author: Lars B. P. Frydenskov(Trifork Security)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (`cs-method`='POST' AND (`sc-status`=200 OR `sc-status`=302)) AND ((`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/splunkd/\_\_upload/indexing/preview%' ESCAPE '\' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%NO\_BINARY\_CHECK=1%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%input.path=shell.xsl%' ESCAPE '\')) OR ((`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/api/search/jobs%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/results%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/opt/splunk/var/run/splunk/dispatch/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/shell.xsl%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential CVE-2023-25717 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-25717 a Remote Code Execution via an unauthenticated HTTP GET Request, in Ruckus Wireless Admin
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some rare false positives may occur if the password contains the characters "$(". Apply addition indicators such as executed commands to remove FP
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/forms/doLogin%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%login\_username%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%password%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%$(%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%\%24\%28%' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2023-4966 Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via webserver logs by looking for a very long host header string.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-host` REGEXP '.{150}'

title: CVE-2023-4966 Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via proxy logs by looking for a very long host header string.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri` LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-host` REGEXP '.{150}'

title: Potential MOVEit Transfer CVE-2023-34362 Exploitation - File Activity
description: Detects file indicators of potential exploitation of MOVEit CVE-2023-34362.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: To avoid FP, this rule should only be applied on MOVEit servers.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.7z' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbs' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\')) OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\') OR ((CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-03- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-04- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-05- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-06- %' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Windows\\Microsoft.net\\Framework64\\v%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Temporary ASP.NET Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%App\_Web\_%' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: MOVEit CVE-2023-34362 Exploitation Attempt - Potential Web Shell Request
description: Detects get requests to specific files used during the exploitation of MOVEit CVE-2023-34362
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/human2.aspx%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/\_human2.aspx%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Information Disclosure CVE-2023-43261 Exploitation - Web
description: Detects exploitation attempts of CVE-2023-43261 and information disclosure in Milesight UR5X, UR32L, UR32, UR35, UR41 before v35.3.0.7 that allows attackers to access sensitive router components in access logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/lang/log/httpd.log%' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: Potential Information Disclosure CVE-2023-43261 Exploitation - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation attempts of CVE-2023-43261 and information disclosure in Milesight UR5X, UR32L, UR32, UR35, UR41 before v35.3.0.7 that allows attackers to access sensitive router components in proxy logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `c-uri` LIKE '%/lang/log/httpd.log%' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: Potential CVE-2023-36874 Exploitation - Fake Wermgr.Exe Creation
description: Detects the creation of a file named "wermgr.exe" being created in an uncommon directory. This could be a sign of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-36874.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\wermgr.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\$WINDOWS.~BT\\NewOS\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\$WinREAgent\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\servicing\\LCU\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\WUDownloadCache\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\Download\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-23752 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects the potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-23752 an Improper access check, in web service endpoints in Joomla
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/api/index.php/v1/%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%public=true%' ESCAPE '\')

title: MSMQ Corrupted Packet Encountered
description: Detects corrupted packets sent to the MSMQ service. Could potentially be a sign of CVE-2023-21554 exploitation
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND (Provider_Name='MSMQ' AND EventID=2027 AND Level=2)

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious Confluence Child Process (Linux)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((ParentImage LIKE '%/java' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%confluence%' ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE '%/bash' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/curl' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/echo' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT CommandLine LIKE '%ulimit -u%' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2023-38331 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious Double Extension File
description: Detects the creation of a file with a double extension and a space by WinRAR. This could be a sign of exploitation of CVE-2023-38331
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\WinRAR.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Rar$%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename REGEXP '\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,4} \.'

title: Potential SocGholish Second Stage C2 DNS Query
description: Detects a DNS query initiated from a "wscript" process for domains matching a specific pattern that was seen being used by SocGholish for its Command and Control traffic
author: Dusty Miller
falsepositives: Legitimate domain names matching the regex pattern by chance (e.g. domain controllers dc01.company.co.uk)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND QueryName REGEXP '[a-f0-9]{4,8}\.(?:[a-z0-9\-]+\.){2}[a-z0-9\-]+'

title: Potential Pikabot C2 Activity
description:
Detects the execution of rundll32 that leads to an external network connection.
The malware Pikabot has been seen to use this technique to initiate C2-communication through hard-coded Windows binaries.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ParentImage LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\SearchFilterHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\SearchProtocolHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\sndvol.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wermgr.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wwahost.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND Protocol='tcp' AND Initiated='true'

title: SNAKE Malware Covert Store Registry Key
description: Detects any registry event that targets the key 'SECURITY\Policy\Secrets\n' which is a key related to SNAKE malware as described by CISA
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%SECURITY\\Policy\\Secrets\\n' ESCAPE '\'

title: SNAKE Malware WerFault Persistence File Creation
description: Detects the creation of a file named "WerFault.exe" in the WinSxS directory by a non-system process, which can be indicative of potential SNAKE malware activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\WerFault.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential SNAKE Malware Installation CLI Arguments Indicator
description: Detects a specific command line arguments sequence seen used by SNAKE malware during its installation as described by CISA in their report
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine REGEXP '\s[a-fA-F0-9]{64}\s[a-fA-F0-9]{16}'

title: COLDSTEEL Persistence Service Creation
description: Detects the creation of new services potentially related to COLDSTEEL RAT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='System' AND (Provider_Name='Service Control Manager' AND EventID=7045 AND (ServiceName='Name' OR ServiceName='msupdate' OR ServiceName='msupdate2') AND ImagePath LIKE '%\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential COLDSTEEL Persistence Service DLL Load
description: Detects a suspicious DLL load by an "svchost" process based on location and name that might be related to ColdSteel RAT. This DLL location and name has been seen used by ColdSteel as the service DLL for its persistence mechanism
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\newdev.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential COLDSTEEL Persistence Service DLL Creation
description: Detects the creation of a file in a specific location and with a specific name related to COLDSTEEL RAT
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\newdev.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential COLDSTEEL RAT File Indicators
description: Detects the creation of a file named "dllhost.exe" in the "C:\users\public\Documents\" directory. Seen being used by the COLDSTEEL RAT in some of its variants.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\users\\public\\Documents\\dllhost.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - DNS
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE query='addatamarket.net' OR query='ans7tv.net' OR query='anstv.net' OR query='backuprabbit.com' OR query='businessvideonews.com' OR query='cloudsponcer.com' OR query='datamarketplace.net' OR query='growthtransport.com' OR query='mobilegamerstats.com' OR query='snoweeanalytics.com' OR query='tagclick-cdn.com' OR query='topographyupdates.com' OR query='unlimitedteacup.com' OR query='virtuallaughing.com' OR query='web-trackers.com'

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - Proxy
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-host` LIKE '%addatamarket.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%ans7tv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%anstv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%backuprabbit.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%businessvideonews.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%cloudsponcer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%datamarketplace.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%growthtransport.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%mobilegamerstats.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%snoweeanalytics.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%tagclick-cdn.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%topographyupdates.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%unlimitedteacup.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%virtuallaughing.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%web-trackers.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Scheduled Tasks Names Used By SVR For GraphicalProton Backdoor
description: Hunts for known SVR-specific scheduled task names
author: CISA
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Security' AND ((EventID=4698 OR EventID=4699 OR EventID=4702) AND (TaskName LIKE '\\defender' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\DefenderService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Application Experience\\StartupAppTaskCheck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Application Experience\\StartupAppTaskCkeck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\ATPUpd' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Data Integrity Scan\\Data Integrity Update' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\DefenderUPDService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\IISUpdateService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Speech\\SpeechModelInstallTask' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WiMSDFS' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Defender\\Defender Update Service' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Defender\\Service Update' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\CheckReporting' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\SubmitReporting' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Filtering Platform\\BfeOnServiceStart' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsDefenderService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsDefenderService2' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\Scheduled AutoCheck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\Scheduled Check' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\WindowUpdate' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Scheduled Tasks Names Used By SVR For GraphicalProton Backdoor - Task Scheduler
description: Hunts for known SVR-specific scheduled task names
author: CISA
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational' AND ((EventID=129 OR EventID=140 OR EventID=141) AND (TaskName LIKE '\\defender' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\DefenderService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Application Experience\\StartupAppTaskCheck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Application Experience\\StartupAppTaskCkeck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\ATPUpd' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Data Integrity Scan\\Data Integrity Update' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\DefenderUPDService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\IISUpdateService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Speech\\SpeechModelInstallTask' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WiMSDFS' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Defender\\Defender Update Service' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Defender\\Service Update' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\CheckReporting' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\SubmitReporting' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Filtering Platform\\BfeOnServiceStart' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsDefenderService' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsDefenderService2' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\Scheduled AutoCheck' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\Scheduled Check' ESCAPE '\' OR TaskName LIKE '\\WindowUpdate' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential APT Mustang Panda Activity Against Australian Gov
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Mustang Panda in a targeted attack against the Australian government as reported by Lab52
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%copy SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%SolidPDF%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Peach Sandstorm APT Process Activity Indicators
description: Detects process creation activity related to Peach Sandstorm APT
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine LIKE '%QP''s*(58vaP!tF4%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Diamond Sleet APT DNS Communication Indicators
description: Detects DNS queries related to Diamond Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Might generate some false positive if triggered by a user during investigation for example.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%3dkit.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%dersmarketim.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%galerielamy.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%olidhealth.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Diamond Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Diamond Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\4800-84DC-063A6A41C5C' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Forest64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\readme.md' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Diamond Sleet APT Process Activity Indicators
description: Detects process creation activity indicators related to Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND CommandLine LIKE '% uTYNkfKxHiZrx3KJ%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Diamond Sleet APT Scheduled Task Creation - Registry
description: Detects registry event related to the creation of a scheduled task used by Diamond Sleet APT during exploitation of Team City CVE-2023-42793 vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%Windows TeamCity Settings User Interface%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT DLL Sideloading Indicators
description: Detects DLL sideloading activity seen used by Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation Related Indicators
description: Detects exploitation indicators related to PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% /c %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-OutFile%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%msiexec %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/i %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/qn %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%IntegratorLogin=fimaribahundq%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential POWERTRASH Script Execution
description: Detects potential execution of the PowerShell script POWERTRASH
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational' OR Channel='PowerShellCore/Operational') AND (EventID=4104 AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.Compression.DeflateStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.MemoryStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GetDelegateForFunctionPointer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%.Invoke()%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GlobalAssemblyCache%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential APT FIN7 POWERHOLD Execution
description: Detects execution of the POWERHOLD script seen used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational' OR Channel='PowerShellCore/Operational') AND (EventID=4104 AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE '%$env:APPDATA%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%function MainPayload%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::WriteAllBytes%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%wscript.exe%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential APT FIN7 Reconnaissance/POWERTRASH Related Activity
description: Detects specific command line execution used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs for reconnaissance and POWERTRASH execution
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%-noni -nop -exe bypass -f \\\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%ADMIN$%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%-ex bypass -noprof -nolog -nonint -f%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential APT FIN7 Related PowerShell Script Created
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific name or suffix which was seen being used often by FIN7 PowerShell scripts
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\_64refl.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'host\_ip.ps1' ESCAPE '\'

title: UNC4841 - Email Exfiltration File Pattern
description: Detects filename pattern of email related data used by UNC4841 for staging and exfiltration
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename REGEXP '/mail/tmp/[a-zA-Z0-9]{3}[0-9]{3}\.tar\.gz'

title: UNC4841 - Download Tar File From Untrusted Direct IP Via Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a "tar" from an IP address that doesn't have a trusted certificate. As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP 'https://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND CommandLine LIKE '%--no-check-certificate%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.tar' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (CommandLine LIKE '%https://10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.16.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.17.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.18.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.19.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.20.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.21.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.22.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.27.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.28.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.29.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.30.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.31.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://169.254.%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Barracuda ESG Exploitation Indicators
description: Detects file indicators as seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%/11111.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/autoins' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/BarracudaMailService' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core\_check.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/get\_fs\_info.pl' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/imgdata.jpg' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_att\_v2.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_bvp74\_auth.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_helo.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_reuse.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_helo' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_reuse' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intentbas' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_attachment.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_content.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_require\_helo.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_rtf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_sender.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_udp.so' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/nfsd\_stub.ko' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_reisertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_risertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize2fstab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/rverify' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/saslautchd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/sendscd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/snapshot.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p7' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/t' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v2.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v31.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v35.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_version' ESCAPE '\'

title: UNC4841 - Download Compressed Files From Temp.sh Using Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a ".zip" or ".rar" files from "temp.sh". As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%https://temp.sh/%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\')

title: UNC4841 - SSL Certificate Exfiltration Via Openssl
description: Detects the execution of "openssl" to connect to an IP address. This techniques was used by UNC4841 to exfiltrate SSL certificates and as a C2 channel with named pipes. Investigate commands executed in the temporal vicinity of this command.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%/openssl' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%s\_client%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-quiet%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-connect%' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '%:443%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:8080%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - Netcon
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp ICO C2 File Download
description: Detects potential malicious .ICO files download from a compromised 3CXDesktopApp via web requests to the the malicious Github repository
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `c-uri` LIKE '%IconStorages/images/main/icon%' ESCAPE '\' AND `c-uri` LIKE '%.ico%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - DNS
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE QueryName LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msedgeupdate.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR QueryName LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - Proxy
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-host` LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-host` LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Lazarus APT DLL Sideloading Activity
description: Detects sideloading of trojanized DLLs used in Lazarus APT campaign in the case of a Spanish aerospace company
author: Thurein Oo, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramShared\\PresentationHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE ':\\ProgramShared\\mscoree.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorcpl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorui.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\fixmapi.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\mapistub.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\tabcal.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\HID.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Launcher
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to launch their malware loader by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational' OR Channel='PowerShellCore/Operational') AND (EventID=4104 AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Starting user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\usersfiles\\user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Force "$wapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%(Sophos).%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lace Tempest File Indicators
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific names or suffixes which was seen being used often in PowerShell scripts by FIN7
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles\\user.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles.war' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\leave' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\user.%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Evidence Eraser
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to erase evidence from victim servers by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel='Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational' OR Channel='PowerShellCore/Operational') AND (EventID=4104 AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE '%cleanLL%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%usersfiles.war%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Path "$tomcat\_dir%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%SysAidServer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%sleep %' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%while(1)%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lace Tempest Cobalt Strike Download
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Lace Tempest to download Cobalt Strike as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND (CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden -c IEX ((new-object net.webclient).downloadstring(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/a'')%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Onyx Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Onyx Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\ADFS\\bg\\inetmgr.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: CMSTP Execution Registry Event
description: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution
author: Nik Seetharaman
falsepositives: Legitimate CMSTP use (unlikely in modern enterprise environments)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\cmmgr32.exe%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Narrator's Feedback-Hub Persistence
description: Detects abusing Windows 10 Narrator's Feedback-Hub
author: Dmitriy Lifanov, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND ((EventType='DeleteValue' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\AppXypsaf9f1qserqevf0sws76dx4k9a5206\\Shell\\open\\command\\DelegateExecute' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\AppXypsaf9f1qserqevf0sws76dx4k9a5206\\Shell\\open\\command\\(Default)' ESCAPE '\')

title: WINEKEY Registry Modification
description: Detects potential malicious modification of run keys by winekey or team9 backdoor
author: omkar72
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\Backup Mgr' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder
author: Den Iuzvyk
falsepositives: Unlikely, there could be conferencing software running from a Temp folder accessing the devices
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\NonPackaged%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%microphone%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%webcam%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%:#Windows#Temp#%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%:#$Recycle.bin#%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%:#Temp#%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%:#Users#Public#%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%:#Users#Default#%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%:#Users#Desktop#%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UAC Bypass Via Wsreset
description: Unfixed method for UAC bypass from Windows 10. WSReset.exe file associated with the Windows Store. It will run a binary file contained in a low-privilege registry.
author: oscd.community, Dmitry Uchakin
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\AppX82a6gwre4fdg3bt635tn5ctqjf8msdd2\\Shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\'

title: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Registry Manipulation
description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook
author: Alexander Rausch
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\HTMLHelp\\data%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Qakbot Registry Activity
description: Detects a registry key used by IceID in a campaign that distributes malicious OneNote files
author: Hieu Tran
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\firm\\soft\\Name' ESCAPE '\'

title: Disable Security Events Logging Adding Reg Key MiniNt
description: Detects the addition of a key 'MiniNt' to the registry. Upon a reboot, Windows Event Log service will stop writing events.
author: Ilyas Ochkov, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND ((TargetObject LIKE 'HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\MiniNt' ESCAPE '\' AND EventType='CreateKey') OR NewName LIKE 'HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\MiniNt' ESCAPE '\')

title: Registry Persistence Mechanisms in Recycle Bin
description: Detects persistence registry keys for Recycle Bin
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND ((EventType='RenameKey' AND NewName LIKE '%\\CLSID\\{645FF040-5081-101B-9F08-00AA002F954E}\\shell\\open%' ESCAPE '\') OR (EventType='SetValue' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\CLSID\\{645FF040-5081-101B-9F08-00AA002F954E}\\shell\\open\\command\\(Default)%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Wdigest CredGuard Registry Modification
description:
Detects potential malicious modification of the property value of IsCredGuardEnabled from
HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecurityProviders\WDigest to disable Cred Guard on a system.
This is usually used with UseLogonCredential to manipulate the caching credentials.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\IsCredGuardEnabled' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via MyComputer Registry Keys
description: Detects modification to the "Default" value of the "MyComputer" key and subkeys to point to a custom binary that will be launched whenever the associated action is executed (see reference section for example)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Unlikely but if you experience FPs add specific processes and locations you would like to monitor for
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\MyComputer%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%(Default)' ESCAPE '\')

title: Sysmon Driver Altitude Change
description:
Detects changes in Sysmon driver altitude value.
If the Sysmon driver is configured to load at an altitude of another registered service, it will fail to load at boot.
author: B.Talebi
falsepositives: Legitimate driver altitude change to hide sysmon
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Services\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Instances\\Sysmon Instance\\Altitude' ESCAPE '\')

title: UAC Bypass via Event Viewer
description: Detects UAC bypass method using Windows event viewer
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via Mpnotify
description: Detects when an attacker register a new SIP provider for persistence and defense evasion
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Might trigger if a legitimate new SIP provider is registered. But this is not a common occurrence in an environment and should be investigated either way
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\mpnotify%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Lolbas OneDriveStandaloneUpdater.exe Proxy Download
description:
Detects setting a custom URL for OneDriveStandaloneUpdater.exe to download a file from the Internet without executing any
anomalous executables with suspicious arguments. The downloaded file will be in C:\Users\redacted\AppData\Local\Microsoft\OneDrive\StandaloneUpdaterreSignInSettingsConfig.json
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\UpdateOfficeConfig\\UpdateRingSettingURLFromOC%' ESCAPE '\'

title: NET NGenAssemblyUsageLog Registry Key Tamper
description:
Detects changes to the NGenAssemblyUsageLog registry key.
.NET Usage Log output location can be controlled by setting the NGenAssemblyUsageLog CLR configuration knob in the Registry or by configuring an environment variable (as described in the next section).
By simplify specifying an arbitrary value (e.g. fake output location or junk data) for the expected value, a Usage Log file for the .NET execution context will not be created.
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\.NETFramework\\NGenAssemblyUsageLog' ESCAPE '\'

title: Driver Added To Disallowed Images In HVCI - Registry
description: Detects changes to the "HVCIDisallowedImages" registry value to potentially add a driver to the list, in order to prevent it from loading.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Omar Khaled (@beacon_exe)
falsepositives: Legitimate usage of this key would also trigger this. Investigate the driver being added and make sure its intended
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Control\\CI\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\HVCIDisallowedImages%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Persistence Via CHM Helper DLL
description: Detects when an attacker modifies the registry key "HtmlHelp Author" to achieve persistence
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\HtmlHelp Author\\Location%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\WOW6432Node\\Microsoft\\HtmlHelp Author\\Location%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Persistence Via DLLPathOverride
description: Detects when an attacker adds a new "DLLPathOverride" value to the "Natural Language" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked by "SearchIndexer.exe" process
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\ContentIndex\\Language\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\StemmerDLLPathOverride%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\WBDLLPathOverride%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\StemmerClass%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\WBreakerClass%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: RestrictedAdminMode Registry Value Tampering
description:
Detects changes to the "DisableRestrictedAdmin" registry value in order to disable or enable RestrictedAdmin mode.
RestrictedAdmin mode prevents the transmission of reusable credentials to the remote system to which you connect using Remote Desktop.
This prevents your credentials from being harvested during the initial connection process if the remote server has been compromise
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa\\DisableRestrictedAdmin' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Provisioning Registry Key Abuse For Binary Proxy Execution - REG
description: Detects potential abuse of the provisioning registry key for indirect command execution through "Provlaunch.exe".
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Provisioning\\Commands\\%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via LSA Extensions
description:
Detects when an attacker modifies the "REG_MULTI_SZ" value named "Extensions" to include a custom DLL to achieve persistence via lsass.
The "Extensions" list contains filenames of DLLs being automatically loaded by lsass.exe. Each DLL has its InitializeLsaExtension() method called after loading.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\LsaExtensionConfig\\LsaSrv\\Extensions%' ESCAPE '\'

title: New DNS ServerLevelPluginDll Installed
description: Detects the installation of a DNS plugin DLL via ServerLevelPluginDll parameter in registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DNS server (restart required)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\services\\DNS\\Parameters\\ServerLevelPluginDll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Security Event Logging Disabled via MiniNt Registry Key - Registry Set
description:
Detects the addition of the 'MiniNt' key to the registry. Upon a reboot, Windows Event Log service will stop writing events.
Windows Event Log is a service that collects and stores event logs from the operating system and applications. It is an important component of Windows security and auditing.
Adversary may want to disable this service to disable logging of security events which could be used to detect their activities.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE 'HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\MiniNt\\(Default)' ESCAPE '\'

title: Modify User Shell Folders Startup Value
description: Detect modification of the startup key to a path where a payload could be stored to be launched during startup
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\User Shell Folders%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%Startup' ESCAPE '\')

title: COM Hijack via Sdclt
description: Detects changes to 'HKCU\Software\Classes\Folder\shell\open\command\DelegateExecute'
author: Omkar Gudhate
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\\DelegateExecute%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via AutodialDLL
description: Detects change the the "AutodialDLL" key which could be used as a persistence method to load custom DLL via the "ws2_32" library
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Services\\WinSock2\\Parameters\\AutodialDLL%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via Outlook Home Page
description:
Detects potential persistence activity via outlook home page.
An attacker can set a home page to achieve code execution and persistence by editing the WebView registry keys.
author: Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems), David Bertho (@dbertho) & Eirik Sveen (@0xSV1), Storebrand
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Outlook\\WebView\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\URL' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential WerFault ReflectDebugger Registry Value Abuse
description: Detects potential WerFault "ReflectDebugger" registry value abuse for persistence.
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\Hangs\\ReflectDebugger' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via GlobalFlags
description: Detects registry persistence technique using the GlobalFlags and SilentProcessExit keys
author: Karneades, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Florian Roth
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Image File Execution Options\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\GlobalFlag%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SilentProcessExit\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\ReportingMode%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\MonitorProcess%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: DHCP Callout DLL Installation
description: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server (restart required)
author: Dimitrios Slamaris
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutDlls' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutEnabled' ESCAPE '\')

title: Add Debugger Entry To Hangs Key For Persistence
description: Detects when an attacker adds a new "Debugger" value to the "Hangs" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked when an application crashes
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: This value is not set by default but could be rarly used by administrators
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\Hangs\\Debugger%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious Application Allowed Through Exploit Guard
description: Detects applications being added to the "allowed applications" list of exploit guard in order to bypass controlled folder settings
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Windows Defender Exploit Guard\\Controlled Folder Access\\AllowedApplications%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Desktop\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\PerfLogs\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Shim Database Patching Activity
description: Detects installation of new shim databases that try to patch sections of known processes for potential process injection or persistence.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\Custom\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\csrss.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\dllhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\RuntimeBroker.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\services.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\sihost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\taskhostw.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\winlogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\WmiPrvSe.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Macro Enabled In A Potentially Suspicious Document
description: Detects registry changes to Office trust records where the path is located in a potentially suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Security\\Trusted Documents\\TrustRecords%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/INetCache/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%/AppData/Local/Temp/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%/PerfLogs/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%C:/Users/Public/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%file:///D:/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%file:///E:/%' ESCAPE '\'))

description: Running Chrome VPN Extensions via the Registry install 2 vpn extension

TargetObject LIKE '%update\_url' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%fdcgdnkidjaadafnichfpabhfomcebme%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%fcfhplploccackoneaefokcmbjfbkenj%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject
