falsepositives: Legitimate creation of jsc or java files in these locations
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%/j2ee/cluster/apps/sap.com/irj/servlet\_jsp/irj/work/%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/j2ee/cluster/apps/sap.com/irj/servlet\_jsp/irj/root/%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.jsp' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.java' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.class' ESCAPE '\')

title: SharePoint ToolShell CVE-2025-53770 Exploitation - Web IIS
description:
Detects access to vulnerable SharePoint components potentially being exploited in CVE-2025-53770 through IIS web server logs.
CVE-2025-53770 is a zero-day vulnerability in SharePoint that allows remote code execution.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((`cs-method`='POST' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/\_layouts/15/ToolPane.aspx%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%DisplayMode=Edit&a=/ToolPane.aspx%' ESCAPE '\') OR (`cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/\_layouts/15/spinstall0.aspx%' ESCAPE '\')) AND `cs-referer` LIKE '%/\_layouts/SignOut.aspx%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious Creation of .library-ms File — Potential CVE-2025-24054 Exploit
description:
Detects creation of '.library-ms' files, which may indicate exploitation of CVE-2025-24054. This vulnerability allows an attacker to trigger an automatic outbound SMB or WebDAV authentication request to a remote server upon archive extraction.
If the system is unpatched, no user interaction is required beyond extracting a malicious archive—potentially exposing the user's NTLMv2-SSP hash to the attacker.
author: Gene Kazimiarovich
falsepositives: Legitimate Library shortcuts under %APPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\Libraries\ (rarely created by end-users)
Custom corporate scripts that programmatically generate .library-ms Files
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%.library-ms' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\7z.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\winrar.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Commvault QLogin with PublicSharingUser and GUID Password (CVE-2025-57788)
description:
Detects a qlogin.exe command attempting to authenticate as the internal `_+_PublicSharingUser_` using a GUID as the password.
This could be an indicator of an attacker exploiting CVE-2025-57788 to gain initial access using leaked credentials.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate administrative scripts that use the `_+_PublicSharingUser_` account for valid purposes.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%qlogin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\_+\_PublicSharingUser\_%' ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine REGEXP '[A-F0-9]{8}-[A-F0-9]{4}-[A-F0-9]{4}-[A-F0-9]{4}-[A-F0-9]{12}')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation Dropped File
description: Detects a specific file being created in the recent folder of Office. These files have been seen being dropped during potential exploitations of CVE-2023-36884
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Office\\Recent\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\file001.url' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - File Downloads
description: Detects files seen being requested by RomCom while potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`c-uri` LIKE '%/ex001.url%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/file001.search-ms%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/file001.url%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/file001.vbs%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/file1.mht%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/o2010.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/redir\_obj.html%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/RFile.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/zip\_k.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/zip\_k2.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/zip\_k3.asp%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-46214 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation of CVE-2023-46214, a remote code execution (RCE) in Splunk Enterprise through insecure XML parsing
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Bhavin Patel (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%NO\_BINARY\_CHECK=1%' ESCAPE '\' AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%input.path%' ESCAPE '\') AND `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%.xsl' ESCAPE '\' AND (`sc-status`=200 OR `sc-status`=302)

title: CVE-2023-4966 Potential Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Webserver
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via webserver logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Michael Haag (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri-stem` LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: CVE-2023-4966 Potential Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Proxy
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via proxy logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Michael Haag (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND `cs-uri` LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND `sc-status`=200

title: Potential CVE-2023-36874 Exploitation - Uncommon Report.Wer Location
description: Detects the creation of a "Report.wer" file in an uncommon folder structure. This could be a sign of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-36874.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WER\\ReportArchive\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Report.wer' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\AppCrash\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\AppHang\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\Critical\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\Kernel\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\NonCritical\_%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-23397 Exploitation Attempt - SMB
description: Detects (failed) outbound connection attempts to internet facing SMB servers. This could be a sign of potential exploitation attempts of CVE-2023-23397.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some false positives may occur from external trusted servers. Apply additional filters accordingly
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=30803 OR EventID=30804 OR EventID=30806) AND (NOT ((ServerAddress LIKE '10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '169.254.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.16.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.17.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.18.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.19.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.20.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.21.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.22.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.27.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.28.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.29.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.30.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '172.31.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress='::1/128' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'fe8%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'fe9%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'fea%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'feb%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'fc%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE 'fd%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Address LIKE '10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '169.254.%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '172.%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '::1%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE 'fe80::%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE 'fc00::%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Address LIKE '%00000000000000000000000000000001%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%FE80000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%FC00000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%0200____C0A8%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%0200____AC%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%0200____0A%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%0200____7F%' ESCAPE '\' OR Address LIKE '%0200____A9FE%' ESCAPE '\') OR (ServerAddress LIKE '%00000000000000000000000000000001%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%FE80000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%FC00000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%0200____C0A8%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%0200____AC%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%0200____0A%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%0200____7F%' ESCAPE '\' OR ServerAddress LIKE '%0200____A9FE%' ESCAPE '\') OR (RemoteAddress LIKE '%00000000000000000000000000000001%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%FE80000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%FC00000000000000%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%0200____C0A8%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%0200____AC%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%0200____0A%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%0200____7F%' ESCAPE '\' OR RemoteAddress LIKE '%0200____A9FE%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Vulnerable Endpoint Connection (Webserver)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-local.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-progress.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/server-info.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri-query` LIKE '%/setup/setupadministrator.action%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`sc-status`=200 OR `sc-status`=302 OR `sc-status`=405)

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Vulnerable Endpoint Connection (Proxy)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='POST' AND (`cs-uri` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-local.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-progress.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri` LIKE '%/json/setup-restore.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri` LIKE '%/server-info.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR `cs-uri` LIKE '%/setup/setupadministrator.action%' ESCAPE '\') AND (`sc-status`=200 OR `sc-status`=302 OR `sc-status`=405)

title: CVE-2023-40477 Potential Exploitation - WinRAR Application Crash
description: Detects a crash of "WinRAR.exe" where the version is lower than 6.23. This could indicate potential exploitation of CVE-2023-40477
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate crash for reasons other than exploitation of the vulnerability
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Channel='Application' AND ((Provider_Name='Application Error' AND EventID=1000 AND AppName='WinRAR.exe') AND (NOT (AppVersion LIKE '6.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '7.%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Pikabot Infection - Suspicious Command Combinations Via Cmd.EXE
description:
Detects the execution of concatenated commands via "cmd.exe". Pikabot often executes a combination of multiple commands via the command handler "cmd /c" in order to download and execute additional payloads.
Commands such as "curl", "wget" in order to download extra payloads. "ping" and "timeout" are abused to introduce delays in the command execution and "Rundll32" is also used to execute malicious DLL files.
In the observed Pikabot infections, a combination of the commands described above are used to orchestrate the download and execution of malicious DLL files.
author: Alejandro Houspanossian ('@lekz86')
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=4688 AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%cmd%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/c%' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '% & %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% || %' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '% curl%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% wget%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% timeout %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% ping %' ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE '% rundll32%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '% mkdir %' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Encrypted Registry Blob Related To SNAKE Malware
description: Detects the creation of a registry value in the ".wav\OpenWithProgIds" key with an uncommon name. This could be related to SNAKE Malware as reported by CISA
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some additional tuning might be required to tune out legitimate processes that write to this key by default
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Classes\\.wav\\OpenWithProgIds\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (TargetObject LIKE '%.AssocFile.WAV' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%.wav.%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: DarkGate - Autoit3.EXE File Creation By Uncommon Process
description:
Detects the usage of curl.exe, KeyScramblerLogon, or other non-standard/suspicious processes used to create Autoit3.exe.
This activity has been associated with DarkGate malware, which uses Autoit3.exe to execute shellcode that performs
process injection and connects to the DarkGate command-and-control server. Curl, KeyScramblerLogon, and these other
processes consitute non-standard and suspicious ways to retrieve the Autoit3 executable.
author: Micah Babinski
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\Autoit3.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\ExtExport.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\KeyScramblerLogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\wmprph.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Autoit3.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: DLL Names Used By SVR For GraphicalProton Backdoor
description: Hunts known SVR-specific DLL names.
author: CISA
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AclNumsInvertHost.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AddressResourcesSpec.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\BlendMonitorStringBuild.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ChildPaletteConnected.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\DeregisterSeekUsers.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\HandleFrequencyAll.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\HardSwapColor.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\LengthInMemoryActivate.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ModeBitmapNumericAnimate.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ModeFolderSignMove.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ParametersNamesPopup.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\PerformanceCaptionApi.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ScrollbarHandleGet.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\UnregisterAncestorAppendAuto.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\WowIcmpRemoveReg.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Peach Sandstorm APT C2 Communication Activity
description: Detects potential C2 communication activity related to Peach Sandstorm APT
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE `cs-method`='GET' AND (`c-uri` LIKE '%/api/Core/Command/Init' ESCAPE '\' OR `c-uri` LIKE '%/api/Core/Command/Restart' ESCAPE '\')

title: Okta 2023 Breach Indicator Of Compromise
description:
Detects new user account creation or activation with specific names related to the Okta Support System 2023 breach.
This rule can be enhanced by filtering out known and legitimate username used in your environnement.
author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (eventtype='user.lifecycle.create' OR eventtype='user.lifecycle.activate') AND `target.user.display.name` LIKE '%svc\_network\_backup%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Office Application Startup - Office Test
description: Detects the addition of office test registry that allows a user to specify an arbitrary DLL that will be executed every time an Office application is started
author: omkar72
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office test\\Special\\Perf%' ESCAPE '\'

title: New DLL Added to AppCertDlls Registry Key
description:
Dynamic-link libraries (DLLs) that are specified in the AppCertDLLs value in the Registry key can be abused to obtain persistence and privilege escalation
by causing a malicious DLL to be loaded and run in the context of separate processes on the computer.
author: Ilyas Ochkov, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND (TargetObject LIKE 'HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\AppCertDlls' ESCAPE '\' OR NewName LIKE 'HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\AppCertDlls' ESCAPE '\')

title: New PortProxy Registry Entry Added
description: Detects the modification of the PortProxy registry key which is used for port forwarding.
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
falsepositives: WSL2 network bridge PowerShell script used for WSL/Kubernetes/Docker (e.g. https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4150#issuecomment-504209723)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Services\\PortProxy\\v4tov4\\tcp\\%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Windows Registry Trust Record Modification
description: Alerts on trust record modification within the registry, indicating usage of macros
author: Antonlovesdnb, Trent Liffick (@tliffick)
falsepositives: This will alert on legitimate macro usage as well, additional tuning is required
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND (OperationType='New registry value created' OR OperationType='Existing registry value modified')) AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Security\\Trusted Documents\\TrustRecords%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Using DebugPath
description: Detects potential persistence using Appx DebugPath
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%Classes\\ActivatableClasses\\Package\\Microsoft.%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\DebugPath' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\PackagedAppXDebug\\Microsoft.%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\(Default)' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Persistence Via Logon Scripts - Registry
description: Detects creation of "UserInitMprLogonScript" registry value which can be used as a persistence method by malicious actors
author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
falsepositives: Investigate the contents of the "UserInitMprLogonScript" value to determine of the added script is legitimate
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%UserInitMprLogonScript%' ESCAPE '\'

title: New BgInfo.EXE Custom DB Path Registry Configuration
description: Detects setting of a new registry database value related to BgInfo configuration. Attackers can for example set this value to save the results of the commands executed by BgInfo in order to exfiltrate information.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate use of external DB to save the results
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Software\\Winternals\\BGInfo\\Database' ESCAPE '\'

title: Enabling COR Profiler Environment Variables
description: Detects .NET Framework CLR and .NET Core CLR "cor_enable_profiling" and "cor_profiler" variables being set and configured.
author: Jose Rodriguez (@Cyb3rPandaH), OTR (Open Threat Research), Jimmy Bayne (@bohops)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\COR\_ENABLE\_PROFILING' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\COR\_PROFILER' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\CORECLR\_ENABLE\_PROFILING' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\CORECLR\_PROFILER\_PATH%' ESCAPE '\')

title: PUA - Sysinternals Tools Execution - Registry
description: Detects the execution of some potentially unwanted tools such as PsExec, Procdump, etc. (part of the Sysinternals suite) via the creation of the "accepteula" registry key.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate use of SysInternals tools. Filter the legitimate paths used in your environment
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND ((TargetObject LIKE '%\\Active Directory Explorer%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Handle%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\LiveKd%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Process Explorer%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\ProcDump%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\PsExec%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\PsLoglist%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\PsPasswd%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\SDelete%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Sysinternals%' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\EulaAccepted' ESCAPE '\')

title: Windows Defender Exclusions Added - Registry
description: Detects the Setting of Windows Defender Exclusions
author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Exclusions%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Outlook Security Settings Updated - Registry
description: Detects changes to the registry values related to outlook security settings
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='Existing registry value modified') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Outlook\\Security\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Delete Defender Scan ShellEx Context Menu Registry Key
description: Detects deletion of registry key that adds 'Scan with Defender' option in context menu. Attackers may use this to make it harder for users to scan files that are suspicious.
author: Matt Anderson (Huntress)
falsepositives: Unlikely as this weakens defenses and normally would not be done even if using another AV.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetObject LIKE '%shellex\\ContextMenuHandlers\\EPP%' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Platform\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Windows Defender\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Defender\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\MsMpEng.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Removal of Potential COM Hijacking Registry Keys
description:
Detects any deletion of entries in ".*\shell\open\command" registry keys.
These registry keys might have been used for COM hijacking activities by a threat actor or an attacker and the deletion could indicate steps to remove its tracks.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: Legitimate software (un)installations are known to cause false positives. Please add them as a filter when encountered
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetObject LIKE '%\\shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\system32\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\OpenWith.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE '%\\Dropbox.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Dropbox.%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Wireshark\_uninstaller.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\wireshark-capture-file\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%peazip%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\PeaZip.%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\Everything.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Everything.%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Installer\\MSI%' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Java\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\installer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Classes\\WOW6432Node\\CLSID\\{4299124F-F2C3-41b4-9C73-9236B2AD0E8F}%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\EdgeUpdate\\Install%' ESCAPE '\' OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Avira\\Antivirus\\' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Avira\\Antivirus\\' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\CLSID\\{305CA226-D286-468e-B848-2B2E8E697B74}\\Shell\\Open\\Command' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\AntiVir.Keyfile\\shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\')) OR ((Image LIKE '%AppData\\Local\\Temp%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\setup.exe%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\Temp\\is-%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\target.tmp%' ESCAPE '\')) OR Image LIKE '%\\ninite.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE '%\\reg.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Discord\\shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\Spotify.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Spotify\\shell\\open\\command' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%C:\\eclipse\\eclipse.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\_Classes\\eclipse+%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%\\Temp%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\TeamViewer%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Windows Recall Feature Enabled - DisableAIDataAnalysis Value Deleted
description:
Detects the enabling of the Windows Recall feature via registry manipulation. Windows Recall can be enabled by deleting the existing "DisableAIDataAnalysis" registry value.
Adversaries may enable Windows Recall as part of post-exploitation discovery and collection activities.
This rule assumes that Recall is already explicitly disabled on the host, and subsequently enabled by the adversary.
author: Sajid Nawaz Khan
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventType='DeleteValue' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsAI\\DisableAIDataAnalysis' ESCAPE '\'

title: Removal Of Index Value to Hide Schedule Task - Registry
description: Detects when the "index" value of a scheduled task is removed or deleted from the registry. Which effectively hides it from any tooling such as "schtasks /query"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%Index%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Removal Of SD Value to Hide Schedule Task - Registry
description: Remove SD (Security Descriptor) value in \Schedule\TaskCache\Tree registry hive to hide schedule task. This technique is used by Tarrask malware
author: Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%SD%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential Persistence Via Disk Cleanup Handler - Registry
description:
Detects when an attacker modifies values of the Disk Cleanup Handler in the registry to achieve persistence.
The disk cleanup manager is part of the operating system. It displays the dialog box […]
The user has the option of enabling or disabling individual handlers by selecting or clearing their check box in the disk cleanup manager's UI.
Although Windows comes with a number of disk cleanup handlers, they aren't designed to handle files produced by other applications.
Instead, the disk cleanup manager is designed to be flexible and extensible by enabling any developer to implement and register their own disk cleanup handler.
Any developer can extend the available disk cleanup services by implementing and registering a disk cleanup handler.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate new entry added by windows
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID=4657 AND OperationType='New registry value created') AND ((EventType='CreateKey' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\VolumeCaches\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Active Setup Temp Folders' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\BranchCache' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Content Indexer Cleaner' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\D3D Shader Cache' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Delivery Optimization Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Device Driver Packages' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Diagnostic Data Viewer database files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Downloaded Program Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\DownloadsFolder' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Feedback Hub Archive log files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Internet Cache Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Language Pack' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Microsoft Office Temp Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Offline Pages Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Old ChkDsk Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Previous Installations' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Recycle Bin' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\RetailDemo Offline Content' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Setup Log Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\System error memory dump files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\System error minidump files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Temporary Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Temporary Setup Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Temporary Sync Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Thumbnail Cache' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Update Cleanup' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Upgrade Discarded Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\User file versions' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Windows Defender' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Windows Error Reporting Files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Windows ESD installation files' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Windows Upgrade Log Files' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Remote Thread Creation By Uncommon Source Image
description: Detects uncommon processes creating remote threads.
author: Perez Diego (@darkquassar), oscd.community
falsepositives: This rule is best put in testing first in order to create a baseline that reflects the data in your environment.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (SourceImage LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\iexplore.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\winlogon.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT ((SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\wininit.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\csrss.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\LogonUI.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\wlrmdr.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\AtBroker.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\dwm.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\fontdrvhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\userinit.exe' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetParentProcessId=4) OR ((SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\schtasks.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\conhost.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\')) OR TargetImage='System' OR (SourceImage LIKE '%\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE '%\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE '%\\POWERPNT.EXE' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetImage LIKE '%C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\')) OR TargetImage IS NULL OR TargetImage='')) AND (NOT ((SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\internet explorer\\iexplore.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (SourceCommandLine LIKE '%https://%' ESCAPE '\' AND SourceCommandLine LIKE '%.checkpoint.com/documents/%' ESCAPE '\' AND SourceCommandLine LIKE '%SmartConsole\_OLH/%' ESCAPE '\' AND SourceCommandLine LIKE '%default.htm#cshid=%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\internet explorer\\iexplore.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (SourceParentImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceParentImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (SourceParentImage LIKE '%\\CheckPoint\\SmartConsole\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND SourceParentImage LIKE '%\\SmartConsole.exe%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE '%\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND SourceImage LIKE '%\\POWERPNT.EXE' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\csrss.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\OneDrive.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE '%\\aurora-dashboard.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE '%\\OfficeSetup.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Remote Thread Creation In Uncommon Target Image
description: Detects uncommon target processes for remote thread creation
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetImage LIKE '%\\calc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\calculator.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\mspaint.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\notepad.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\ping.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\sethc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\spoolsv.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\wordpad.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\write.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\csrss.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ((SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\OpenWith.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\AtBroker.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\Sethc.exe' ESCAPE '\'))) AND (NOT (StartFunction='EtwpNotificationThread' OR SourceImage LIKE '%unknown process%' ESCAPE '\' OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\VMware\\VMware Tools\\vmtoolsd.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND StartFunction='GetCommandLineW' AND (TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe' ESCAPE '\')) OR (SourceImage LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Xerox\\XeroxPrintExperience\\CommonFiles\\XeroxPrintJobEventManagerService.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND StartFunction='LoadLibraryW' AND TargetImage LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\spoolsv.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Remote Thread Creation Via PowerShell In Uncommon Target
description: Detects the creation of a remote thread from a Powershell process in an uncommon target process
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (SourceImage LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetImage LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Process Hollowing Activity
description: Detects when a memory process image does not match the disk image, indicative of process hollowing.
author: Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock', SCYTHE '@scythe_io', Sittikorn S
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Type='Image is replaced' AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%:\\Program Files (x86)%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WMIADAP.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wbem\\WMIADAP.exe%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Opera\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\opera.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Antivirus Software DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of DLLs that are part of antivirus software suchas McAfee, Symantec...etc
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
falsepositives: Applications that load the same dlls mentioned in the detection section. Investigate them and filter them out if a lot FPs are caused.
Dell SARemediation plugin folder (C:\Program Files\Dell\SARemediation\plugin\log.dll) is known to contain the 'log.dll' file.
The Canon MyPrinter folder 'C:\Program Files\Canon\MyPrinter\' is known to contain the 'log.dll' file
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Bitdefender Antivirus Free\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Bitdefender Antivirus Free\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Dell\\SARemediation\\audit\\TelemetryUtility.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Dell\\SARemediation\\plugin\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Dell\\SARemediation\\audit\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\')) OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Canon\\MyPrinter\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\AVAST Software\\Avast\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\AVAST Software\\Avast\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\AVG\\Antivirus\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\AVG\\Antivirus\\log.dll' ESCAPE '\')))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\qrt.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\F-Secure\\Anti-Virus\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\F-Secure\\Anti-Virus\\%' ESCAPE '\'))) OR ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ashldres.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\lockdown.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vsodscpl.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\McAfee\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\McAfee\\%' ESCAPE '\'))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vftrace.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\CyberArk\\Endpoint Privilege Manager\\Agent\\x32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\CyberArk\\Endpoint Privilege Manager\\Agent\\x32\\%' ESCAPE '\'))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\wsc.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files\\AVAST Software\\Avast\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files (x86)\\AVAST Software\\Avast\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\AVG\\Antivirus\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\AVG\\Antivirus\\%' ESCAPE '\')))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\tmdbglog.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files\\Trend Micro\\Titanium\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files (x86)\\Trend Micro\\Titanium\\%' ESCAPE '\'))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\DLPPREM32.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files\\ESET%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\program Files (x86)\\ESET%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Libvlc.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "libvlc.dll", a DLL that is legitimately used by "VLC.exe"
author: X__Junior
falsepositives: False positives are expected if VLC is installed in non-default locations
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\libvlc.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\VideoLAN\\VLC\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\VideoLAN\\VLC\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of DBGHELP.DLL
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "dbghelp.dll"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
falsepositives: Legitimate applications loading their own versions of the DLL mentioned in this rule
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SystemTemp\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Anaconda3\\Lib\\site-packages\\vtrace\\platforms\\windll\\amd64\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Anaconda3\\Lib\\site-packages\\vtrace\\platforms\\windll\\i386\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Epic Games\\Launcher\\Engine\\Binaries\\ThirdParty\\DbgHelp\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Epic Games\\MagicLegends\\x86\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%opera\\Opera Installer Temp\\opera\_package%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\assistant\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: DLL Load By System Process From Suspicious Locations
description: Detects when a system process (i.e. located in system32, syswow64, etc.) loads a DLL from a suspicious location or a location with permissive permissions such as "C:\Users\Public"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\PerfLogs\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: WMI ActiveScriptEventConsumers Activity Via Scrcons.EXE DLL Load
description: Detects signs of the WMI script host process "scrcons.exe" loading scripting DLLs which could indicates WMI ActiveScriptEventConsumers EventConsumers activity.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: Dell computers on some versions register an event consumer that is known to cause false positives when brightness is changed by the corresponding keyboard button
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\scrcons.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vbscript.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\wbemdisp.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\wshom.ocx' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\scrrun.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CCleanerReactivator.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "CCleanerReactivator.dll"
author: X__Junior
falsepositives: False positives could occur from other custom installation paths. Apply additional filters accordingly.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\CCleanerReactivator.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\CCleaner\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\CCleaner\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\CCleanerReactivator.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Microsoft VBA For Outlook Addin Loaded Via Outlook
description: Detects outlvba (Microsoft VBA for Outlook Addin) DLL being loaded by the outlook process
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate macro usage. Add the appropriate filter according to your environment
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\outlook.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\outlvba.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of MsCorSvc.DLL
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "mscorsvc.dll".
author: Wietze Beukema
falsepositives: Legitimate applications loading their own versions of the DLL mentioned in this rule.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\mscorsvc.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Chrome Frame Helper DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "chrome_frame_helper.dll"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\chrome\_frame\_helper.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\local\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of Libcurl.DLL Via GUP.EXE
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "libcurl.dll" by the "gup.exe" process from an uncommon location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\gup.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\libcurl.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT Image LIKE '%\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: WMIC Loading Scripting Libraries
description:
Detects threat actors proxy executing code and bypassing application controls by leveraging wmic and the `/FORMAT` argument switch to download and execute an XSL file (i.e js, vbs, etc).
It could be an indicator of SquiblyTwo technique, which uses Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to execute malicious code.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: The command wmic os get lastbootuptime loads vbscript.dll
The command wmic os get locale loads vbscript.dll

Since the ImageLoad event doesn't have enough information in this case. It's better to look at the recent process creation events that spawned the WMIC process and investigate the command line and parent/child processes to get more insights
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\wmic.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\jscript.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vbscript.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Python DLL SideLoading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of Python DLL files.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\python39.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\python310.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\python311.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\python312.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (((ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Python3%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Python3%' ESCAPE '\') OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python3%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Product='Python' AND Signed='true' AND Description='Python' AND Company='Python Software Foundation'))) AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Anaconda3\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\cpython\\externals\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\cpython\\PCbuild\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Users%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\\_MEI%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Microsoft Excel Add-In Loaded From Uncommon Location
description: Detects Microsoft Excel loading an Add-In (.xll) file from an uncommon location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some tuning might be required to allow or remove certain locations used by the rule if you consider them as safe locations
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Desktop\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Downloads\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Perflogs\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Windows\\Tasks\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%.xll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential WWlib.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "wwlib.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\wwlib.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: PowerShell Core DLL Loaded Via Office Application
description: Detects PowerShell core DLL being loaded by an Office Product
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mspub.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\outlook.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenote.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenoteim.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\System.Management.Automation.Dll%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\System.Management.Automation.ni.Dll%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Unsigned Image Loaded Into LSASS Process
description: Loading unsigned image (DLL, EXE) into LSASS process
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\lsass.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND Signed='false'

title: CredUI.DLL Loaded By Uncommon Process
description: Detects loading of "credui.dll" and related DLLs by an uncommon process. Attackers might leverage this DLL for potential use of "CredUIPromptForCredentials" or "CredUnPackAuthenticationBufferW".
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: Other legitimate processes loading those DLLs in your environment.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\credui.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\wincredui.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (OriginalFileName='credui.dll' OR OriginalFileName='wincredui.dll')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SystemApps\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\ImmersiveControlPanel\\SystemSettings.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\regedit.exe' ESCAPE '\'))) AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%\\opera\_autoupdate.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE '%\\procexp64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\procexp.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\Teams.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: MMC Loading Script Engines DLLs
description:
Detects when the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) loads the DLL libraries like vbscript, jscript etc which might indicate an attempt
to execute malicious scripts within a trusted system process for bypassing application whitelisting or defense evasion.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate MMC operations or extensions loading these libraries
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\mmc.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vbscript.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\jscript.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\jscript9.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Wazuh Security Platform DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL side loading of DLLs that are part of the Wazuh security platform
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Many legitimate applications leverage this DLL. (Visual Studio, JetBrains, Ruby, Anaconda, GithubDesktop, etc.)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\libwazuhshared.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\libwinpthread-1.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\mingw64\\bin\\libwinpthread-1.dll' ESCAPE '\'))

title: WerFaultSecure Loading DbgCore or DbgHelp - EDR-Freeze
description:
Detects WerFaultSecure.exe loading dbgcore.dll or dbghelp.dll which contains the MiniDumpWriteDump function.
The MiniDumpWriteDump function creates a minidump of a process by suspending all threads in the target process to ensure a consistent memory snapshot.
The EDR-Freeze technique abuses WerFaultSecure.exe running as a Protected Process Light (PPL) with WinTCB protection level to suspend EDR/AV processes.
By leveraging MiniDumpWriteDump's thread suspension behavior, edr-freeze allows malicious activity to execute undetected during the suspension period.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\WerFaultSecure.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\dbgcore.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\dbghelp.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Unsigned .node File Loaded
description:
Detects the loading of unsigned .node files.
Adversaries may abuse a lack of .node integrity checking to execute arbitrary code inside of trusted applications such as Slack.
.node files are native add-ons for Electron-based applications, which are commonly used for desktop applications like Slack, Discord, and Visual Studio Code.
This technique has been observed in the DripLoader malware, which uses unsigned .node files to load malicious native code into Electron applications.
author: Jonathan Beierle (@hullabrian)
falsepositives: VsCode extensions or similar legitimate tools might use unsigned .node files. These should be investigated on a case-by-case basis, and whitelisted if determined to be benign.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%.node' ESCAPE '\' AND (Signed='false' OR SignatureStatus='Unavailable')) AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%\\Code.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%.vscode\\extensions\\ms-toolsai.jupyter-%' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\electron.napi.node' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\node.napi.glibc.node' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Mfdetours.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "mfdetours.dll". While using "mftrace.exe" it can be abused to attach to an arbitrary process and force load any DLL named "mfdetours.dll" from the current directory of execution.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\mfdetours.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\10\\bin\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Using Coregen.exe
description: Detect usage of the "coregen.exe" (Microsoft CoreCLR Native Image Generator) binary to sideload arbitrary DLLs.
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\coregen.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Silverlight\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Silverlight\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: VMGuestLib DLL Sideload
description: Detects DLL sideloading of VMGuestLib.dll by the WmiApSrv service.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: FP could occur if the legitimate version of vmGuestLib already exists on the system
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\VMware\\VMware Tools\\vmStatsProvider\\win32%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vmGuestLib.dll%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WmiApSrv.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT Signed='true')

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Via JsSchHlp
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading using JUSTSYSTEMS Japanese word processor
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\JSESPR.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Common Files\\Justsystem\\JsSchHlp\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential RoboForm.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "roboform.dll", a DLL used by RoboForm Password Manager
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: If installed on a per-user level, the path would be located in "AppData\Local". Add additional filters to reflect this mode of installation
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\roboform.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\roboform-x64.dll' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT ((Image LIKE ' C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Siber Systems\\AI RoboForm\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE ' C:\\Program Files\\Siber Systems\\AI RoboForm\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE '%\\robotaskbaricon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\robotaskbaricon-x64.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of DbgModel.DLL
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "DbgModel.dll"
author: Gary Lobermier
falsepositives: Legitimate applications loading their own versions of the DLL mentioned in this rule
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\dbgmodel.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.WinDbg\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Windows Kits\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of DBGCORE.DLL
description: Detects DLL sideloading of "dbgcore.dll"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
falsepositives: Legitimate applications loading their own versions of the DLL mentioned in this rule
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\dbgcore.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SystemTemp\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Steam\\bin\\cef\\cef.win7x64\\dbgcore.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%opera\\Opera Installer Temp\\opera\_package%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\assistant\\dbgcore.dll' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Clfs.SYS Loaded By Process Located In a Potential Suspicious Location
description: Detects Clfs.sys being loaded by a process running from a potentially suspicious location. Clfs.sys is loaded as part of many CVEs exploits that targets Common Log File.
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\clfs.sys' ESCAPE '\' AND ((Image LIKE '%:\\Perflogs\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Temporary Internet%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Image LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\Favorites\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\Favourites\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\Contacts\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\Pictures\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potentially Suspicious Volume Shadow Copy Vsstrace.dll Load
description: Detects the image load of VSS DLL by uncommon executables
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vsstrace.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\ImmersiveControlPanel\\SystemSettings.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Temp\\{%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Package Cache\\{%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image IS NULL)) AND (NOT (Image LIKE 'C:\\$WinREAgent\\Scratch\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE '%\\temp\\is-%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%\\avira\_system\_speedup.tmp%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: DotNET Assembly DLL Loaded Via Office Application
description: Detects any assembly DLL being loaded by an Office Product
author: Antonlovesdnb
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mspub.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenote.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenoteim.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\outlook.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\assembly\\%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Remote DLL Load Via Rundll32.EXE
description: Detects a remote DLL load event via "rundll32.exe".
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '\\\\%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Of MpSvc.DLL
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "MpSvc.dll".
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema
falsepositives: Legitimate applications loading their own versions of the DLL mentioned in this rule.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\MpSvc.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Windows Defender\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Platform\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: VMMap Signed Dbghelp.DLL Potential Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of a signed dbghelp.dll by the Sysinternals VMMap.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%C:\\Debuggers\\dbghelp.dll%' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\vmmap.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\vmmap64.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND Signed='true'

title: CLR DLL Loaded Via Office Applications
description: Detects CLR DLL being loaded by an Office Product
author: Antonlovesdnb
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mspub.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\outlook.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenote.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\onenoteim.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\clr.dll%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential RjvPlatform.DLL Sideloading From Default Location
description: Detects loading of "RjvPlatform.dll" by the "SystemResetPlatform.exe" binary which can be abused as a method of DLL side loading since the "$SysReset" directory isn't created by default.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\SystemResetPlatform\\SystemResetPlatform.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\$SysReset\\Framework\\Stack\\RjvPlatform.dll' ESCAPE '\'

title: Potential CCleanerDU.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "CCleanerDU.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: False positives could occur from other custom installation paths. Apply additional filters accordingly.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\CCleanerDU.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\CCleaner\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\CCleaner\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE '%\\CCleaner.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\CCleaner64.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Third Party Software DLL Sideloading
description: Detects DLL sideloading of DLLs that are part of third party software (zoom, discord....etc)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\commfunc.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\local\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Lenovo\\Communications Utility\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Lenovo\\Communications Utility\\%' ESCAPE '\')))) OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\tosbtkbd.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Toshiba\\Bluetooth Toshiba Stack\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Toshiba\\Bluetooth Toshiba Stack\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Unsigned DLL Loaded by Windows Utility
description:
Detects windows utilities loading an unsigned or untrusted DLL.
Adversaries often abuse those programs to proxy execution of malicious code.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Image LIKE '%\\InstallUtil.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RegAsm.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\RegSvcs.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (Signed='true' OR (SignatureStatus='errorChaining' OR SignatureStatus LIKE 'errorCode\_endpoint' ESCAPE '\' OR SignatureStatus='errorExpired' OR SignatureStatus='trusted' OR SignatureStatus='Valid') OR Signed IS NULL OR (Signed='' OR Signed='-') OR SignatureStatus IS NULL OR (SignatureStatus='' OR SignatureStatus='-') OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Installer\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%.tmp-\\Microsoft.Deployment.WindowsInstaller.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%.tmp-\\Avira.OE.Setup.CustomActions.dll' ESCAPE '\')) OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\RegAsm.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\assembly\\NativeImages%' ESCAPE '\'))) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\K-Lite Codec Pack\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\K-Lite Codec Pack\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential Goopdate.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "goopdate.dll", a DLL used by googleupdate.exe
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: False positives are expected from Google Chrome installations running from user locations (AppData) and other custom locations. Apply additional filters accordingly.
Other third party chromium browsers located in AppData
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\goopdate.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (((Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE '%.tmp\\Dropbox%' ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%.tmp\\goopdate.dll%' ESCAPE '\')) OR ((Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SystemTemp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%.tmp\\GoogleUpdate.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SystemTemp\\GUM%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Amsi.DLL Loaded Via LOLBIN Process
description: Detects loading of "Amsi.dll" by a living of the land process. This could be an indication of a "PowerShell without PowerShell" attack
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\amsi.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\ExtExport.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\odbcconf.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Unsigned Module Loaded by ClickOnce Application
description: Detects unsigned module load by ClickOnce application.
author: @SerkinValery
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Apps\\2.0\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (Signed='false' OR SignatureStatus='Expired')

title: Potential AVKkid.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "AVKkid.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AVKkid.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((Image LIKE '%C:\\Program Files (x86)\\G DATA\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%C:\\Program Files\\G DATA\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\AVKKid.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\G DATA\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\G DATA\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential ShellDispatch.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "ShellDispatch.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some installers may trigger some false positives
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ShellDispatch.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential SolidPDFCreator.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "SolidPDFCreator.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\SolidPDFCreator.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%\\SolidPDFCreator.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SolidDocuments\\SolidPDFCreator\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\SolidDocuments\\SolidPDFCreator\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: PowerShell Core DLL Loaded By Non PowerShell Process
description:
Detects loading of essential DLLs used by PowerShell by non-PowerShell process.
Detects behavior similar to meterpreter's "load powershell" extension.
author: Tom Kern, oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova, Tim Shelton, Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: Used by some .NET binaries, minimal on user workstation.
Used by Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Description='System.Management.Automation' OR OriginalFileName='System.Management.Automation.dll' OR (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\System.Management.Automation.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\System.Management.Automation.ni.dll' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7-preview\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Image LIKE '%C:\\Program Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.PowerShellPreview%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.PowerShellPreview%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\dsac.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\runscripthelper.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\sdiagnhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\ServerManager.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\SyncAppvPublishingServer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\winrshost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\winrshost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\mscorsvw.exe' ESCAPE '\'))) AND (NOT (((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\IDE\\Ssms.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft SQL Server\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SQL Server\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\Tools\\Binn\\SQLPS.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE '%\\Citrix\\ConfigSync\\ConfigSyncRun.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\chocolatey\\choco.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2-agent\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE '%\\thor64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\thor.exe' ESCAPE '\')) OR Image IS NULL))

title: System Control Panel Item Loaded From Uncommon Location
description: Detects image load events of system control panel items (.cpl) from uncommon or non-system locations which might be the result of sideloading.
author: Anish Bogati
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\hdwwiz.cpl' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\appwiz.cpl' ESCAPE '\') AND (NOT (ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential DLL Sideloading Via ClassicExplorer32.dll
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading using ClassicExplorer32.dll from the Classic Shell software
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\ClassicExplorer32.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Classic Shell\\%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious WSMAN Provider Image Loads
description: Detects signs of potential use of the WSMAN provider from uncommon processes locally and remote execution.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\WsmSvc.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\WsmAuto.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Microsoft.WSMan.Management.ni.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (OriginalFileName='WsmSvc.dll' OR OriginalFileName='WSMANAUTOMATION.DLL' OR OriginalFileName='Microsoft.WSMan.Management.dll')) OR (Image LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND OriginalFileName='WsmWmiPl.dll')) AND (NOT ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\PowerShell\\6\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\6\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\sdiagnhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s BITS%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%svchost.exe -k GraphicsPerfSvcGroup -s GraphicsPerfSvc%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%svchost.exe -k NetworkService -p -s Wecsvc%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%svchost.exe -k netsvcs%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm\\v%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\FrameworkArm64\\v%' ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE '%\\mscorsvw.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\Configure-SMRemoting.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\ServerManager.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2-agent\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Citrix\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE 'C:\\$WINDOWS.~BT\\Sources\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE '%\\mmc.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine IS NULL))

title: Potential Vivaldi_elf.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "vivaldi_elf.dll"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\vivaldi\_elf.dll' ESCAPE '\' AND (NOT (Image LIKE '%\\Vivaldi\\Application\\vivaldi.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%\\Vivaldi\\Application\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: WMI Event Subscription
description: Detects creation of WMI event subscription persistence method
author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
falsepositives: Exclude legitimate (vetted) use of WMI event subscription in your network
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID=19 OR EventID=20 OR EventID=21

title: Unusual File Download From File Sharing Websites - File Stream
description: Detects the download of suspicious file type from a well-known file and paste sharing domain
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
